; O

. O

It O

I O

-- O

. O

But O

. O

We O

. O

So O

? O

: O

, O

? O

! O

But O

. O

The O

. O

So O

. O

. O

to O

. O

If O

, O

. O

And O

. O

Do O

. O

So O

. O

. O

. O

And O

. O

I O

. O

. O

Brothers O

. O

So O

, O

. O

In O

, O

, O

, O

. O

, O

. O

You O

. O

That O

. O

I O

. O

. O

that O

. O

So O

. O

But O

, O
sin O

no O

. O

Before O

, O

. O

But O

, O

, O

. O

The O

was O

, O

. O

Sin O
found O

by O

to O

. O

Now O
the O
law O
is O

, O
and O

is O

and O

. O

Does O

that O
is O

? O

No O
, O

that O

to O

. O

This O

. O

can O

to O

We O

, O

. O

to O

. O

But O

, O

That O

much O

prefer O
those O
gifts O
that O
help O
the O
church O
grow O

. O

So O

in O

. O

He O
bragged O
and O
called O
himself O
a O
great O
man O
. O

All O
the O
people O
-- O
the O
least O
important O
and O
the O
most O
important O
-- O
believed O
what O
he O
said O
. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
This O
man O
has O
the O
power O
of O
God O
that O
is O
called O
' O
the O
Great O
Power O
. O
' O
'' O

Simon O
amazed O
the O
people O
with O
his O
magic O
for O
so O
long O
that O
the O
people O
became O
his O
followers O
. O

But O
Philip O
told O
the O
people O
the O
Good O
News O
about O
God O
's O
kingdom O
and O
the O
power O
of O
Jesus O
Christ O
. O

Men O
and O
women O
believed O
Philip O
and O
were O
baptized O
. O

Simon O
himself O
also O
believed O
, O
and O
after O
he O
was O
baptized O
, O
he O
stayed O
close O
to O
Philip O
. O

When O
he O
saw O
the O
miraculous O
signs O
and O
powerful O
things O
Philip O
did O
, O
he O
was O
amazed O
. O

The O
apostles O
in O
Jerusalem O
heard O
that O
the O
people O
of O
Samaria O
had O
accepted O
the O
word O
of O
God O
. O

So O
they O
sent O
Peter O
and O
John O
to O
the O
people O
in O
Samaria O
. O

When O
Peter O
and O
John O
arrived O
, O
they O
prayed O
for O
the O
Samaritan O
believers O
to O
receive O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
. O

These O
people O
had O
been O

in O
the O
name O
of O
the O
Lord O
Jesus O
, O
but O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
had O
not O
yet O
come O
down O
on O
any O
of O
them O
. O

This O
is O
why O
Peter O
and O
John O
prayed O
. O

When O
the O
two O
apostles O
laid O
their O
hands O
on O
the O
people O
, O
they O
received O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
. O

Simon O
saw O
that O
the O
Spirit O
was O
given O
to O
people O
when O
the O
apostles O
laid O
their O
hands O
on O
them O
. O

So O
he O
offered O
the O
apostles O
money O
. O

He O
said O
, O
`` O
Give O
me O
this O
power O
so O
that O
when O
I O
lay O
my O
hands O
on O
someone O
, O
they O
will O
receive O
the O

. O
'' O

Peter O
said O
to O
Simon O
, O
`` O
You O
and O
your O
money O
should O
both O
be O
destroyed O
because O
you O
thought O
you O
could O
buy O
God O
's O
gift O
with O
money O
. O

You O
can O
not O
share O
with O
us O
in O
this O
work O
. O

Your O
heart O
is O
not O
right O
before O
God O
. O

Change O
your O
heart O
! O

Turn O
away O
from O
these O
evil O

and O
pray O
to O
the O
Lord O
. O

Maybe O
he O
will O
forgive O
you O
. O

I O
see O
that O
you O
are O
full O
of O
bitter O

and O
can O
not O
stop O
yourself O
from O
doing O

. O
'' O

Simon O
answered O
, O
`` O

of O
you O

for O

, O
so O

what O
you O

. O

. O

. O

, O

through O

. O

. O

, O
`` O

that O

down O
to O

. O

, O

? O

, O

. O

: O
`` O

. O

. O

, O

. O

His O

has O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

in O

the O

from O
Azotus O
to O
Caesarea O
. O

Paul O
said O
, O
`` O
My O

and O
fathers O
, O

to O
me O
! O

I O
will O

. O
'' O

, O

. O

, O
`` O

, O

, O

. O

. O

. O

`` O

. O

. O

. O

? O

, O
' O

. O

. O

The O

, O

, O

. O

, O

, O

. O

, O

. O

to O

. O

, O

. O

But O

, O

, O

? O

, O

? O
'' O

He O

, O
`` O

. O

, O

. O

, O

. O

The O

who O

to O

Paul O

. O

The O
commander O
was O
afraid O
because O
he O
had O
already O

Paul O
in O
chains O
, O
and O
he O
was O
a O
Roman O

. O

The O
next O
day O
the O

decided O
to O
learn O
why O
the O

were O

Paul O
. O

So O
he O

the O
leading O

and O
the O

high O

to O
meet O

. O

He O

Paul O
's O

and O
had O

in O
to O
face O
the O
council O
. O

Paul O
and O
Silas O
traveled O
through O
the O

of O
Amphipolis O
and O
Apollonia O
. O

They O
came O
to O
the O
city O
of O

, O
where O
there O
was O
a O

. O

Paul O
went O
into O

synagogue O
to O
see O
the O
Jews O
as O
he O
always O
did O
. O

The O
next O
three O

, O
on O
each O

day O
, O
he O
discussed O
the O
Scriptures O
with O

. O

He O
explained O
the O
Scriptures O
to O
show O
them O
that O
the O
Christ O
had O
to O
die O
and O
then O
rise O
from O
death O
. O

He O
said O
, O
`` O
This O
Jesus O
that O
I O
am O
telling O
you O
about O
is O
the O
Christ O
. O
'' O

Some O
of O
the O

there O
believed O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
and O
decided O
to O
join O

. O

Also O
, O
a O

number O
of O
Greeks O
who O

can O

that O
they O
are O
true O
. O

The O

Spirit O
also O
shows O
that O
these O
things O
are O

. O

God O

given O
this O

. O
'' O

When O

, O

. O

. O

But O

. O

He O

`` O

, O

-LRB- O

Judea O
. O

They O
gathered O
the O
money O
and O
gave O
it O
to O
Barnabas O
and O
Saul O
, O
who O
took O
it O
to O
the O
elders O
in O
Judea O
. O

Paul O
went O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Derbe O
and O
then O
to O
Lystra O
, O
where O
a O
follower O
of O
Jesus O
named O
Timothy O
lived O
. O

Timothy O
's O
mother O
was O
a O
Jewish O
believer O
, O
but O
his O
father O
was O
a O
Greek O
. O

The O
believers O
in O
the O
cities O
of O
Lystra O
and O
Iconium O
had O
only O
good O
things O
to O
say O
about O
him O
. O

Paul O
wanted O
Timothy O
to O
travel O
with O
him O
, O
but O
all O
the O
Jews O
living O
in O
that O
area O
knew O
that O
his O
father O
was O
a O
Greek O
. O

So O
Paul O
circumcised O
Timothy O
to O
please O
the O
Jews O
. O

Then O
Paul O
and O
those O
with O
him O
traveled O
through O
other O
cities O
. O

They O
gave O
the O
believers O
the O
rules O
and O
decisions O
from O
the O
apostles O
and O
elders O
in O
Jerusalem O
. O

They O
told O
them O
to O
obey O
these O
rules O
. O

So O
the O
churches O
were O
becoming O
stronger O
in O
the O
faith O
and O
were O
growing O
bigger O
every O
day O
. O

Paul O
and O
those O
with O
him O
went O
through O
the O
areas O
of O
Phrygia O
and O
Galatia O
because O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
did O
not O
allow O
them O
to O
tell O
the O
Good O
News O
in O
the O
province O
of O
Asia O
. O

When O
they O
reached O
the O
border O
of O
Mysia O
, O
they O
tried O
to O
go O
on O
into O
Bithynia O
, O
but O
the O
Spirit O
of O
Jesus O
did O
not O
let O
them O
go O
there O
. O

So O
they O
passed O
by O
Mysia O
and O
went O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Troas O
. O

That O
night O
Paul O
saw O
a O
vision O
. O

In O
it O
, O
a O
man O
from O
Macedonia O
came O
to O
Paul O
. O

The O
man O
stood O
there O
and O
begged O
, O
`` O
Come O
across O
to O
Macedonia O
and O
help O
us O
. O
'' O

After O
Paul O
had O
seen O
the O
vision O
, O
we O
immediately O
prepared O
to O
leave O
for O
Macedonia O
. O

We O
understood O
that O
God O
had O
called O
us O
to O
tell O
the O
Good O
News O
to O
those O
people O
. O

We O
left O
Troas O
in O
a O
ship O
and O
sailed O
to O
the O
island O
of O
Samothrace O
. O

The O
next O
day O
we O
sailed O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Neapolis O
. O

Then O
we O
went O
to O
Philippi O
, O
a O
Roman O
colony O
and O
the O
leading O
city O
in O
that O
part O
of O
Macedonia O
. O

We O
stayed O
there O
for O
a O
few O
days O
. O

On O
the O
Sabbath O
day O
we O
went O
out O
the O
city O
gate O
to O
the O
river O
. O

There O
we O
thought O
we O
might O
find O
a O
special O
place O
for O
prayer O
. O

Some O
women O
had O
gathered O
there O
, O
so O
we O
sat O
down O
and O
talked O
with O
them O
. O

There O
was O
a O
woman O
there O
named O
Lydia O
from O
the O
city O
of O
Thyatira O
. O

Her O
job O
was O
selling O
purple O
cloth O
. O

She O
was O
a O
worshiper O
of O
the O
true O
God O
. O

Lydia O
was O
listening O
to O
Paul O
, O
and O
the O
Lord O
opened O
her O
heart O
to O
accept O
what O
Paul O
was O
saying O
. O

She O
and O
all O
the O
people O
living O
in O
her O
house O
were O
baptized O
. O

Then O
she O
invited O
us O
into O
her O
home O
. O

She O
said O
, O
`` O
If O
you O
think O
I O
am O
a O
true O
believer O
in O
the O
Lord O
Jesus O
, O
come O

in O
my O
house O
. O
'' O

She O
persuaded O
us O
to O
stay O
with O
her O
. O

One O
day O
we O
were O
going O
to O
the O
place O
for O
prayer O
, O
and O
a O
servant O
girl O
met O
us O
. O

She O
had O
a O
spirit O
in O
her O
that O
gave O
her O
the O
power O
to O
tell O
what O
would O
happen O
in O
the O
future O
. O

By O
doing O
this O
she O
earned O
a O
lot O
of O
money O
for O
the O
men O
who O
owned O
her O
. O

She O
started O
following O
Paul O
and O
the O
rest O
of O
us O
around O
. O

She O
kept O
shouting O
, O
`` O
These O
men O
are O

of O
the O
Most O
High O
God O
! O

They O
are O
telling O
you O
how O
you O
can O
be O
saved O
! O
'' O

She O
continued O
doing O
this O
for O
many O
days O
. O

This O
bothered O
Paul O
, O
so O
he O
turned O
and O
said O
to O
the O
spirit O
, O
`` O
By O
the O
power O
of O
Jesus O
Christ O
, O
I O
command O
you O
to O
come O
out O
of O
her O
! O
'' O

Immediately O
, O
the O
spirit O
came O
out O
. O

When O
the O
men O
who O
owned O
the O
servant O
girl O
saw O
this O
, O
they O
realized O
that O
they O
could O
no O
longer O
use O
her O
to O
make O
money O
. O

So O
they O
grabbed O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
and O
dragged O
them O
to O
the O
public O
square O
to O
meet O
with O
the O
authorities O
. O

They O
brought O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
before O
the O
Roman O
officials O
and O
said O
, O
`` O
These O
men O
are O
Jews O
, O
and O
they O
are O
making O
trouble O
in O
our O
city O
. O

They O
are O
telling O
people O
to O
do O
things O
that O
are O
not O
right O
for O
us O
as O
Romans O
to O
do O
. O
'' O

The O
whole O
crowd O
turned O
against O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
. O

The O
officials O
tore O
the O
clothes O
off O
both O
men O
and O
ordered O
that O
they O
be O
beaten O
with O
rods O
. O

They O
were O
beaten O
severely O
and O
thrown O
into O
jail O
. O

The O
officials O
told O
the O

, O
`` O
Guard O
them O
very O
carefully O
! O
'' O

When O
the O

heard O
this O
special O
order O
, O
he O
put O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
far O
inside O
the O
jail O
and O
bound O
their O
feet O
between O
large O
blocks O
of O
wood O
. O

About O
midnight O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
were O
praying O
and O
singing O
songs O
to O
God O
. O

The O
other O
prisoners O
were O
listening O
to O
them O
. O

Suddenly O
there O
was O
an O
earthquake O
so O
strong O
that O
it O
shook O
the O
foundation O
of O
the O
jail O
. O

All O
the O
doors O
of O
the O

opened O
, O
and O
the O
chains O
on O
all O
the O
prisoners O
fell O
off O
. O

The O
jailer O
woke O
up O
and O
saw O
that O
the O
jail O
doors O
were O
open O
. O

He O
thought O
that O
the O

had O
already O

, O
so O
he O
got O
his O
sword O
and O
was O
ready O
to O
kill O
himself O
. O

But O
Paul O
shouted O
, O
`` O
Do O
n't O
hurt O
yourself O
! O

We O
are O
all O
here O
! O
'' O

The O
jailer O
told O
someone O
to O
bring O
a O
light O
. O

Then O
he O
ran O
inside O
and O
, O
shaking O
with O

, O

down O
in O

of O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
. O

Then O

, O
`` O
Men O
, O
what O
must O
I O
do O
to O

? O
'' O

They O
said O
to O

, O
`` O
Believe O
in O
the O
Lord O
Jesus O
and O
you O
will O
be O
saved O
-- O

and O

who O

in O

. O
'' O

So O
Paul O
and O
Silas O

the O

of O
the O
Lord O
to O
the O
jailer O
and O

people O
who O
lived O
in O
his O
house O
. O

It O
was O
late O
at O
night O
, O
but O
the O
jailer O
took O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
and O
washed O
their O
wounds O
. O

Then O
the O
jailer O
and O
all O
his O
people O
were O

. O

After O
this O
the O
jailer O
took O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
home O
and O
gave O
them O
some O
food O
. O

All O
the O
people O
were O
very O
happy O
because O
they O
now O
believed O
in O
God O
. O

The O
next O
morning O
the O
Roman O
officials O
sent O
some O
soldiers O
to O
tell O
the O

, O
`` O
Let O
these O
men O
go O
free O
. O
'' O

The O

said O
to O

, O
`` O
The O
officials O
have O
sent O
these O
soldiers O
to O
let O
you O
go O
free O
. O

You O
can O
leave O
now O
. O

Go O
in O
peace O
. O
'' O

But O
Paul O
said O
to O
the O

, O
`` O
Those O
officials O
did O
not O

that O
we O
did O
anything O

, O
but O
they O
beat O
us O
in O
public O
and O

in O
jail O
. O

And O
we O
are O
Roman O
citizens O
. O

Now O
they O
want O
us O
to O
go O
away O
quietly O
. O

No O
, O
they O
must O
come O
here O
themselves O
and O
lead O

out O
! O
'' O

The O
soldiers O
told O
the O
officials O
what O
Paul O
said O
. O

When O
they O
heard O
that O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
were O
Roman O
citizens O
, O
they O
were O
afraid O
. O

So O
they O
came O
and O
told O
them O
they O
were O
sorry O
. O

They O
led O
them O
out O
of O
the O
jail O
and O
asked O
them O
to O
leave O
the O
city O
. O

But O
when O
Paul O
and O
Silas O
came O
out O
of O
the O
jail O
, O
they O
went O
to O
Lydia O
's O
house O
. O

They O
saw O
some O
of O
the O
believers O
there O
and O
encouraged O
them O
. O

Then O
they O
left O
. O

One O
day O
Peter O
and O
John O
went O
to O
the O
Temple O
area O
. O

It O
was O
three O
o'clock O
in O
the O
afternoon O
, O
which O
was O
the O
time O
for O
the O
daily O
Temple O
prayer O
service O
. O

As O
they O
were O
entering O
the O
Temple O
area O
, O
a O
man O
was O
there O
who O
had O
been O
crippled O
all O
his O
life O
. O

He O
was O
being O
carried O
by O
some O
friends O
who O
brought O
him O
to O
the O
Temple O
every O
day O
. O

They O
put O
him O
by O
one O
of O
the O
gates O
outside O
the O
Temple O
. O

It O
was O
called O
Beautiful O
Gate O
. O

There O
he O
begged O
for O
money O
from O
the O
people O
going O
to O
the O
Temple O
. O

That O
day O
he O
saw O
Peter O
and O
John O
going O
into O
the O
Temple O
area O
. O

He O
asked O
them O
for O
money O
. O

Peter O
and O
John O
looked O
at O
the O
crippled O
man O
and O
said O
, O
`` O
Look O
at O
us O
! O
'' O

He O
looked O
at O
them O
; O
he O
thought O
they O
would O
give O
him O
some O
money O
. O

But O
Peter O
said O
, O
`` O
I O
do O
n't O
have O
any O
silver O
or O
gold O
, O
but O
I O
do O
have O
something O
else O
I O
can O
give O
you O
. O

By O
the O
power O
of O
Jesus O
Christ O
from O
Nazareth O
-- O
stand O
up O
and O
walk O
! O
'' O

Then O
Peter O
took O
the O
man O
's O
right O
hand O
and O
lifted O
him O
up O
. O

Immediately O
his O
feet O
and O
legs O
became O
strong O
. O

He O
jumped O
up O
, O
stood O
on O
his O
feet O
, O
and O
began O
to O
walk O
. O

He O
went O
into O
the O
Temple O
area O
with O
them O
. O

He O
was O
walking O
and O
jumping O
and O
praising O
God O
. O

All O
the O
people O
recognized O
him O
. O

They O
knew O
he O
was O
the O
crippled O
man O
who O
always O
sat O
by O
the O
Beautiful O
Gate O
to O
beg O
for O
money O
. O

Now O
they O
saw O
this O
same O
man O
walking O
and O
praising O
God O
. O

They O
were O
amazed O
. O

They O
did O
not O
understand O
how O
this O
could O
happen O
. O

The O
man O
was O
holding O
on O
to O
Peter O
and O
John O
. O

All O
the O
people O
were O
amazed O
. O

They O
ran O
to O
Peter O
and O
John O
at O
Solomon O
's O
Porch O
. O

When O
Peter O
saw O
this O
, O
he O
said O
to O
the O
people O
, O
`` O
My O
Jewish O
brothers O
, O
why O
are O
you O
surprised O
at O
this O
? O

You O
are O
looking O
at O
us O
as O
if O
it O
was O
our O
power O
that O
made O
this O
man O
walk O
. O

Do O
you O
think O
this O
was O
done O
because O
we O
are O
good O
? O

No O
, O
God O
did O
it O
! O

He O
is O
the O
God O
of O
Abraham O
, O
the O
God O
of O
Isaac O
, O
and O
the O
God O
of O
Jacob O
. O

He O
is O
the O
God O
of O
all O
our O
fathers O
. O

He O
gave O
glory O
to O
Jesus O
, O
his O
special O
servant O
. O

But O
you O
handed O
him O
over O
to O
be O
killed O
. O

Pilate O
decided O
to O
let O
him O
go O
free O
. O

But O
you O
told O
Pilate O
you O
did O
not O
want O
him O
. O

Jesus O
was O
holy O
and O
good O
, O
but O
you O
said O
you O
did O
not O
want O
him O
. O

You O
told O
Pilate O
to O
give O
you O
a O
murderer O
instead O
of O
Jesus O
. O

And O
so O
you O
killed O
the O
one O
who O
gives O
life O
! O

But O
God O
raised O
him O
from O
death O
. O

We O
are O
witnesses O
of O
this O
-- O
we O
saw O
it O
with O
our O
own O
eyes O
. O

`` O
This O
crippled O
man O
was O
healed O
because O
we O
trusted O
in O
Jesus O
. O

It O
was O
Jesus O
' O
power O
that O
made O
him O
well O
. O

You O
can O
see O
this O
man O
, O
and O
you O
know O
him O
. O

He O
was O
made O
completely O
well O
because O
of O
faith O
in O
Jesus O
. O

You O
all O
saw O
it O
happen O
! O

`` O
My O
brothers O
, O
I O
know O
that O
what O
you O
did O
to O
Jesus O
was O
done O
because O
you O
did O
not O
understand O
what O
you O
were O
doing O
. O

And O
your O
leaders O
did O
not O
understand O
any O
more O
than O
you O
did O
. O

But O
God O
said O
these O
things O
would O
happen O
. O

Through O
the O
prophets O
he O
said O
that O
his O
Christ O
would O
suffer O
and O
die O
. O

I O
have O
told O
you O
how O
God O
made O
this O
happen O
. O

So O
you O
must O
change O
your O
hearts O
and O
lives O
. O

Come O
back O
to O
God O
, O
and O
he O
will O
forgive O
your O
sins O
. O

Then O
the O
Lord O
will O
give O
you O
times O
of O
spiritual O
rest O
. O

He O
will O
send O
you O
Jesus O
, O
the O
one O
he O
chose O
to O
be O
the O
Christ O
. O

`` O
But O
Jesus O
must O
stay O
in O
heaven O
until O
the O
time O
when O
all O
things O
will O
be O
made O
right O
again O
. O

God O
told O
about O
this O
time O
when O
he O
spoke O
long O
ago O
through O
his O
holy O
prophets O
. O

Moses O
said O
, O
' O
The O
Lord O
your O
God O
will O
give O
you O
a O
prophet O
. O

That O
prophet O
will O
come O
from O
among O
your O
own O
people O
. O

He O
will O
be O
like O
me O
. O

You O
must O

. O

. O
' O

`` O

. O

276 O

. O

. O

But O

. O

`` O

a O
big O
group O
of O
Jewish O
priests O
believed O
and O
obeyed O
. O

Stephen O
received O
a O
great O
blessing O
. O

God O
gave O
him O
power O
to O
do O
great O
wonders O
and O
miraculous O
signs O
among O
the O
people O
. O

But O
some O
of O
the O
Jews O
there O
were O
from O
the O
synagogue O
of O
Free O
Men O
, O
as O
it O
was O
called O
. O

The O
group O
included O
Jews O
from O
Cyrene O
, O
Alexandria O
, O
Cilicia O
, O
and O
Asia O
. O

They O
started O
arguing O
with O
Stephen O
. O

But O
the O
Spirit O
was O
helping O
him O
speak O
with O
wisdom O
. O

His O
words O
were O
so O
strong O
that O
these O
Jews O
could O
not O
argue O
with O
him O
. O

So O
they O
told O
some O
men O
to O
say O
, O
`` O
We O
heard O
Stephen O
say O
bad O
things O
against O
Moses O
and O
against O
God O
! O
'' O

By O
doing O
this O
, O
these O
Jews O
upset O
the O
people O
, O
the O
older O
Jewish O
leaders O
, O
and O
the O
teachers O
of O
the O
law O
. O

They O
became O
so O
angry O
that O
they O
came O
and O
grabbed O
Stephen O
and O
took O
him O
to O
a O
meeting O
of O
the O
high O
council O
. O

The O
Jews O
brought O
some O
men O
into O
the O
meeting O
to O
tell O
lies O
about O
Stephen O
. O

These O
men O
said O
, O
`` O
This O
man O
is O
always O
saying O
things O
against O
this O
holy O
place O
and O
against O
the O
Law O
of O
Moses O
. O

We O
heard O
him O
say O
that O
Jesus O
from O
Nazareth O
will O
destroy O
this O
place O
and O
change O
what O
Moses O
told O
us O
to O
do O
. O
'' O

Everyone O
there O
in O
the O
council O
meeting O
was O
staring O
at O
Stephen O
. O

They O
saw O
that O
his O
face O
looked O
like O
the O
face O
of O
an O
angel O
. O

When O
we O
were O
safe O
on O
land O
, O
we O
learned O
that O
the O
island O
was O
called O
Malta O
. O

The O
people O
who O
lived O
there O
were O
very O
good O
to O
us O
. O

It O
was O
raining O
and O
very O
cold O
, O
so O
they O
built O
a O
fire O
and O
welcomed O
all O
of O
us O
. O

Paul O
gathered O
a O
pile O
of O
sticks O
for O
the O
fire O
. O

He O
was O
putting O
the O
sticks O
on O
the O
fire O
, O
and O
a O
poisonous O
snake O
came O
out O
because O
of O
the O
heat O
and O
bit O
him O
on O
the O
hand O
. O

When O
the O
people O
living O
on O
the O
island O
saw O
the O
snake O
hanging O
from O
his O
hand O
, O
they O
said O
, O
`` O
This O
man O
must O
be O
a O
murderer O
! O

He O
did O
not O
die O
in O
the O
sea O
, O
but O
Justice O
does O
not O
want O
him O
to O
live O
. O
'' O

But O
Paul O
shook O
the O
snake O
off O
into O
the O
fire O
and O
was O
not O
hurt O
. O

The O
people O
thought O
he O
would O
swell O
up O
or O
fall O
down O
dead O
. O

They O
waited O
and O
watched O
him O
for O
a O
long O
time O
, O
but O
nothing O
bad O
happened O
to O
him O
. O

So O
they O
changed O
their O
opinion O
. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
He O
is O
a O
god O
! O
'' O

There O
were O
some O
fields O
around O
that O
same O
area O
. O

They O
were O
owned O
by O
a O
man O
named O
Publius O
, O
the O
most O
important O
Roman O
official O
on O
the O
island O
. O

He O
welcomed O
us O
into O
his O
home O
and O
was O
very O
good O
to O
us O
. O

We O
stayed O
in O
his O
house O
for O
three O
days O
. O

Publius O
' O
father O
was O
very O
sick O
. O

He O
had O
a O
fever O
and O
dysentery O
, O
but O
Paul O
went O
to O
him O
and O
prayed O
for O
him O
. O

He O
laid O
his O
hands O
on O
the O
man O
and O
healed O
him O
. O

After O
this O
happened O
, O
all O
the O
other O
sick O
people O
on O
the O
island O
came O
to O
Paul O
, O
and O
he O
healed O
them O
too O
. O

The O
people O
on O
the O
island O
gave O
us O
many O
honors O
. O

And O
after O
we O
had O
been O
there O
three O
months O
and O
were O
ready O
to O
leave O
, O
they O
provided O
us O
everything O
we O
needed O
for O
our O
trip O
. O

We O
got O
on O
a O
ship O
from O
Alexandria O
that O
had O
stayed O
on O
the O
island O
of O
Malta O
during O
the O
winter O
. O

On O
the O
front O
of O
the O
ship O
was O
the O
sign O
for O
the O
twin O
gods O
. O

We O
stopped O
at O
the O
city O
of O
Syracuse O
. O

We O
stayed O
there O
three O
days O
and O
then O
left O
. O

We O
came O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Rhegium O
. O

The O
next O
day O
a O
wind O
began O
to O
blow O
from O
the O
southwest O
, O
so O
we O
were O
able O
to O
leave O
. O

A O
day O
later O
we O
came O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Puteoli O
. O

We O
found O
some O
believers O
there O
, O
who O
asked O
us O
to O
stay O
with O
them O
a O
week O
. O

Finally O
, O
we O
came O
to O
Rome O
. O

The O
brothers O
and O
sisters O
in O
Rome O
heard O
about O
us O
and O
came O
out O
to O
meet O
us O
at O
the O
Market O
of O
Appius O
and O
at O
the O
Three O
Inns O
. O

When O
Paul O
saw O
these O
believers O
, O
he O
thanked O
God O
and O
felt O
encouraged O
. O

When O
we O
came O
to O
Rome O
, O
Paul O
was O
allowed O
to O
live O
alone O
. O

But O
a O
soldier O
stayed O
with O
him O
to O
guard O
him O
. O

Three O
days O
later O
Paul O
sent O
for O
some O
of O
the O
most O
important O
Jews O
. O

When O
they O
came O
together O
, O
he O
said O
, O
`` O
My O
brothers O
, O
I O
have O
done O
nothing O
against O
our O
people O
or O
against O
the O
customs O
of O
our O
fathers O
. O

But O
I O
was O
arrested O
in O
Jerusalem O
and O
handed O
over O
to O
the O
Romans O
. O

They O
asked O
me O
many O
questions O
, O
but O
they O
could O
not O
find O
any O
reason O
why O
I O
should O
be O
put O
to O
death O
. O

So O
they O
wanted O
to O
let O
me O
go O
free O
. O

But O
the O
Jews O
there O
did O
not O
want O
that O
. O

So O
I O
had O
to O
ask O
to O
come O
to O
Rome O
to O
have O
my O
trial O
before O
Caesar O
. O

That O
does O
n't O
mean O
I O
am O
accusing O
my O
people O
of O
doing O
anything O
wrong O
. O

That O
is O
why O
I O
wanted O
to O
see O
you O
and O
talk O
with O
you O
. O

I O
am O
bound O
with O
this O
chain O
because O
I O
believe O
in O
the O
hope O
of O
Israel O
. O
'' O

The O
Jews O
answered O
Paul O
, O
`` O
We O
have O
received O
no O
letters O
from O
Judea O
about O
you O
. O

None O
of O
our O
Jewish O
brothers O
who O
have O
traveled O
from O
there O
brought O
news O
about O
you O
or O
told O
us O
anything O
bad O
about O
you O
. O

We O
want O
to O
hear O
your O
ideas O
. O

We O
know O
that O
people O
everywhere O
are O
speaking O
against O
this O
new O
group O
. O
'' O

Paul O
and O
the O
Jews O
chose O
a O
day O
for O
a O
meeting O
. O

On O
that O
day O
many O
more O
of O
these O
Jews O
met O
with O
Paul O
at O
his O
house O
. O

He O
spoke O
to O
them O
all O
day O
long O
, O
explaining O
God O
's O
kingdom O
to O
them O
. O

He O
used O
the O
Law O
of O
Moses O
and O
the O
writings O
of O
the O
prophets O
to O
persuade O
them O
to O
believe O
in O
Jesus O
. O

Some O
of O
the O
Jews O
believed O
what O
he O
said O
, O
but O
others O
did O
not O
believe O
. O

They O
had O
an O
argument O
among O
themselves O
and O
were O
ready O
to O
leave O
. O

But O
Paul O
said O
one O
more O
thing O
to O
them O
: O
`` O
The O
Holy O
Spirit O
spoke O
the O
truth O
to O
your O
fathers O
through O
Isaiah O
the O
prophet O
. O

He O
said O
, O
' O
Go O
to O
this O
people O
and O
tell O

: O
You O
will O
listen O
and O
you O
will O

, O
but O

will O
not O

. O

You O
will O
look O
and O
you O
will O
see O
, O
but O
you O
will O
not O
understand O
what O
you O
see O
. O

Yes O
, O
the O
minds O
of O
these O
people O
are O
now O
closed O
. O

They O
have O
ears O
, O
but O
they O
do O
n't O
listen O
. O

They O
have O
eyes O
, O
but O
they O
refuse O
to O
see O
. O

If O
their O
minds O
were O
not O
closed O
, O
they O
might O
see O
with O
their O
eyes O
; O
they O
might O
hear O
with O
their O
ears O
; O
they O
might O
understand O
with O
their O
minds O
. O

Then O
they O
might O
turn O
back O
to O
me O
and O
be O
healed O
. O
' O

`` O
I O
want O
you O
Jews O
to O
know O
that O
God O
has O
sent O
his O
salvation O
to O
the O
non-Jewish O
people O
. O

They O
will O
listen O
! O
'' O

Paul O
stayed O
two O
full O
years O
in O
his O
own O
rented O
house O
. O

He O
welcomed O
all O
the O
people O
who O
came O
and O
visited O
him O
. O

He O
told O
them O
about O
God O
's O
kingdom O
and O
taught O
them O
about O
the O
Lord O
Jesus O
Christ O
. O

He O
was O
very O
bold O
, O
and O
no O
one O
tried O
to O
stop O
him O
from O
speaking O
. O

Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
went O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Iconium O
. O

As O
they O
did O
in O
Antioch O
, O
they O
entered O
the O
Jewish O
synagogue O
. O

They O
spoke O
to O
the O
people O
there O
. O

They O
spoke O
so O
well O
that O
many O
Jews O
and O
Greeks O
believed O
what O
they O
said O
. O

But O
some O
of O
the O
Jews O
did O
not O
believe O
. O

They O
said O
things O
that O
caused O
the O
non-Jewish O
people O
to O
be O
angry O
and O
turn O
against O
the O
Lord O
's O
followers O
. O

So O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
stayed O
in O
Iconium O
a O
long O
time O
, O
and O
they O
spoke O
bravely O
for O
the O
Lord O
. O

They O
told O
the O
people O
about O
God O
's O
grace O
. O

The O
Lord O
proved O
that O
what O
they O
said O
was O
true O
by O
causing O
miraculous O
signs O
and O
wonders O
to O
be O
done O
through O
them O
. O

But O
some O
of O
the O
people O
in O
the O
city O
agreed O
with O
the O
Jews O
who O
did O
not O
believe O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
. O

Others O
followed O
the O
apostles O
. O

So O
the O
city O
was O
divided O
. O

Some O
of O
the O
Jews O
there O
, O
as O
well O
as O
their O

and O
some O
of O
the O
non-Jewish O
people O
, O
were O
determined O
to O
hurt O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
. O

They O
wanted O
to O
stone O
them O
to O
death O
. O

When O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
learned O
about O
this O
, O
they O
left O
the O
city O
. O

They O
went O
to O
Lystra O
and O
Derbe O
, O
cities O
in O
Lycaonia O
, O
and O
to O
the O
surrounding O
areas O
. O

They O
told O
the O
Good O
News O
there O
too O
. O

In O
Lystra O
there O
was O
a O
man O
who O
had O
something O
wrong O
with O
his O
feet O
. O

He O
had O
been O
born O
crippled O
and O
had O
never O
walked O
. O

He O
was O
sitting O
and O
listening O
to O
Paul O
speak O
. O

Paul O
looked O
straight O
at O
him O
and O
saw O
that O
the O
man O
believed O
God O
could O
heal O
him O
. O

So O
Paul O
shouted O
, O
`` O
Stand O
up O
on O
your O
feet O
! O
'' O

The O
man O
jumped O
up O
and O
began O
walking O
around O
. O

When O
the O
people O
saw O
what O
Paul O
did O
, O
they O
shouted O
in O
their O
own O
Lycaonian O
language O
. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
The O
gods O
have O
come O
down O
to O
us O
in O
the O
form O
of O
humans O
! O
'' O

The O
people O
began O
to O
call O
Barnabas O
`` O
Zeus O
, O
'' O
and O
they O
called O
Paul O
`` O
Hermes O
, O
'' O
because O
he O
was O
the O
main O
speaker O
. O

The O
temple O
of O
Zeus O
was O
near O
the O
city O
. O

The O
priest O
of O
this O
temple O
brought O
some O
bulls O
and O
flowers O
to O
the O
city O
gates O
. O

The O
priest O
and O
the O
people O
wanted O
to O
offer O
a O

to O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
. O

But O
when O
the O
apostles O
, O
Barnabas O
and O
Paul O
, O
understood O
what O
the O
people O
were O
doing O
, O
they O
tore O
their O
own O
clothes O
. O

Then O
they O
ran O
in O
among O
the O
people O
and O
shouted O
to O
them O
: O
`` O
Men O
, O
why O
are O
you O
doing O
this O
? O

We O
are O
not O
gods O
. O

We O
are O
human O
just O
like O
you O
. O

We O
came O
to O
tell O
you O
the O
Good O
News O
. O

We O
are O
telling O
you O
to O
turn O
away O
from O
these O
worthless O
things O
. O

Turn O
to O
the O
true O
living O
God O
, O
the O
one O
who O
made O
the O
sky O
, O
the O
earth O
, O
the O
sea O
, O
and O
everything O
that O
is O
in O
them O
. O

`` O
In O
the O
past O
God O
let O
all O
the O
nations O
do O
what O
they O
wanted O
. O

But O
God O
was O
always O
there O
doing O
the O
good O
things O
that O
prove O
he O
is O
real O
. O

He O
gives O
you O
rain O
from O
heaven O
and O
good O
harvests O
at O
the O
right O
times O
. O

He O
gives O
you O
plenty O
of O
food O
and O
fills O
your O
hearts O
with O
joy O
. O
'' O

Even O
after O
saying O
all O
this O
, O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
still O
could O
hardly O
stop O
the O
people O
from O
offering O
sacrifices O
to O
them O
. O

Then O
some O
Jews O
came O
from O
Antioch O
and O
Iconium O
and O
persuaded O
the O
people O
to O
turn O
against O
Paul O
. O

So O
they O
threw O
stones O
at O
him O
and O
dragged O
him O
out O
of O
the O
town O
. O

They O
thought O
they O
had O
killed O
him O
. O

But O
when O
the O
followers O
of O
Jesus O
gathered O
around O
him O
, O
he O
got O
up O
and O
went O
back O
into O
the O
town O
. O

The O
next O
day O
he O
and O
Barnabas O
left O
and O
went O
to O
the O
city O
of O
Derbe O
. O

They O
also O
told O
the O
Good O
News O
in O
the O
city O
of O
Derbe O
, O
and O
many O
people O
became O
followers O
of O
Jesus O
. O

Then O
Paul O
and O
Barnabas O
returned O
to O
the O
cities O
of O
Lystra O
, O
Iconium O
, O
and O
Antioch O
. O

In O
those O
cities O
they O
helped O
the O
followers O
grow O
stronger O
in O
their O
faith O
and O
encouraged O
them O
to O
continue O
trusting O
God O
. O

They O
told O
them O
, O
`` O
We O
must O
suffer O
many O
things O
on O
our O
way O
into O
God O
's O

. O
'' O

They O
also O

for O

These O

, O

. O

. O

. O

This O

had O

's O

. O

. O

, O
`` O

'' O

? O

, O
`` O

`` O

. O

This O

. O

; O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

, O

. O

' O

`` O

Tent O

, O

. O

. O

. O

`` O

God O
does O

. O

This O

: O
' O
The O

, O

is O

, O

. O

? O

? O

Remember O
, O

made O

! O
' O
'' O

Then O

said O
, O
`` O
You O

! O

You O

to O

. O

. O

That O

how O

, O

! O

They O

. O

They O
even O

who O
long O
ago O

that O

. O

And O

. O

You O

, O

. O

But O

! O
'' O

When O
those O
in O

, O

Most O

Theophilus O
: O

What O

. O

They O
also O

God O
by O
telling O
people O
his O
message O
. O

I O

all O

. O

. O

I O
did O
this O
so O
that O

can O
be O
sure O
that O
what O
you O
have O
been O
taught O
is O
true O
. O

During O
the O
time O
when O
Herod O
ruled O
Judea O
, O
there O
was O
a O
priest O
named O
Zechariah O
. O

He O
belonged O
to O
Abijah O
's O
group O
. O

His O
wife O
came O
from O
the O
family O
of O
Aaron O
. O

Her O
name O
was O
Elizabeth O
. O

Zechariah O
and O
Elizabeth O
were O
both O
good O
people O
who O
pleased O
God O
. O

They O
did O
everything O
the O
Lord O
commanded O
, O
always O
following O
his O
instructions O
completely O
. O

But O
they O
had O
no O
children O
. O

Elizabeth O
could O
not O
have O
a O
baby O
, O
and O
both O
of O

were O
very O
old O
. O

Zechariah O
was O
serving O
as O

before O
God O
for O
his O
group O
. O

It O
was O
his O
group O
's O
time O
to O
serve O
. O

The O
priests O
always O
chose O
one O
priest O
to O
offer O
the O

, O
and O
Zechariah O
was O
the O
one O
chosen O
this O
time O
. O

So O
he O
went O
into O

Temple O
of O
the O
Lord O
to O

the O

. O

There O
was O
a O
large O

outside O
praying O
at O
the O

the O

was O

. O

Then O
, O
on O
the O
right O
side O
of O
the O
incense O
table O
an O
angel O
of O
the O
Lord O
came O
and O
stood O
before O
Zechariah O
. O

When O
he O
saw O
the O
angel O
, O

was O
upset O
and O
very O
afraid O
. O

But O
the O
angel O
said O
to O
him O
, O
`` O
Zechariah O
, O
do O
n't O
be O
afraid O
. O

Your O
prayer O
has O
been O
heard O
by O
God O
. O

Your O
wife O
Elizabeth O
will O
give O
birth O
to O
a O
baby O
boy O
, O
and O
you O
will O
name O
him O
John O
. O

You O
will O
be O
very O
happy O
, O
and O
many O
others O
will O
share O
your O
joy O
over O
his O
birth O
. O

He O
will O
be O
a O
great O
man O
for O
the O
Lord O
. O

He O
will O
never O
drink O
wine O
or O

. O

Even O
before O
he O
is O
born O
, O
he O
will O
be O
filled O
with O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
. O

`` O
John O
will O
help O
many O
people O
of O
Israel O
return O
to O
the O
Lord O
their O
God O
. O

John O
himself O
will O
go O
ahead O
of O
the O

and O

for O
his O
coming O
. O

He O
will O

like O

and O
will O
have O
the O

spirit O
. O

He O
will O
make O

between O
fathers O
and O
their O
children O
. O

He O
will O
cause O
people O
who O
are O
not O
obeying O

to O
change O
and O
start O
thinking O
the O
way O

. O
'' O

Zechariah O

to O

, O
`` O

that O

? O

, O

. O

, O
`` O
I O

Gabriel O
, O

. O

Now O
, O

! O

will O

to O

until O

when O

. O

did O

. O

But O

. O

Outside O

. O

. O

, O

. O

? O

. O
'' O

. O

Then O

. O

taught O

they O

always O
pray O
and O
never O

. O

He O
used O
this O
story O
to O

: O
`` O
Once O
there O
was O
a O
judge O
in O
a O

. O

He O
did O
not O

about O

. O

He O

. O

In O

was O

whose O

died O
. O

She O
came O
many O

, O
' O
There O
is O
a O
man O
who O
is O

. O

my O

! O
' O

But O

did O

to O

. O

After O

, O

, O
' O
I O
do O

care O
about O

. O

And O

. O

But O

. O

If O
I O

what O
she O
wants O
, O
then O

alone O
. O

But O

I O

give O
her O
what O
she O
wants O
, O
she O
will O
bother O
me O
until O
I O
am O

. O
' O
'' O

The O
Lord O
said O
, O
`` O

, O
there O
is O
meaning O
in O
what O
the O
bad O
judge O
said O
. O

God O
's O
people O
shout O
to O

night O
and O

, O

always O
give O

what O

. O

He O
will O
not O
be O
slow O
to O
answer O

. O

I O
tell O
you O
, O
God O
will O
help O
his O
people O
quickly O
. O

But O
when O
the O
Son O
of O
Man O
comes O
again O
, O
will O
he O
find O
people O
on O
earth O
who O
believe O
in O

? O
'' O

There O
were O
some O
people O
who O
thought O
they O
were O
very O
good O
and O
looked O
down O
on O
everyone O
else O
. O

Jesus O
used O
this O
story O
to O
teach O
them O
: O
`` O
One O
time O
there O
was O
a O
Pharisee O
and O
a O
tax O
collector O
. O

One O
day O
they O
both O
went O
to O

to O

. O

The O
Pharisee O
stood O
alone O
, O
away O
from O
the O
tax O
collector O
. O

When O
the O
Pharisee O
prayed O
, O
he O
said O
, O
O O
God O
, O
I O
thank O
you O
that O
I O
am O
not O
as O
bad O
as O
other O
people O
. O

I O
am O
not O
like O
men O
who O
steal O
, O
cheat O
, O
or O
commit O
adultery O
. O

I O
thank O
you O
that O
I O
am O
better O
than O
this O
tax O
collector O
. O

I O
fast O
twice O
a O
week O
, O
and O
I O
give O
a O
tenth O
of O
everything O
I O
get O
! O
' O

`` O
The O
tax O
collector O
stood O
alone O
too O
. O

But O
when O
he O
prayed O
, O
he O
would O
not O
even O
look O
up O
to O

. O

He O
felt O
very O

before O
God O
. O

He O
said O
, O
O O
God O
, O
have O
mercy O
on O
me O
. O

I O
am O
a O
sinner O
! O
' O

I O
tell O
you O
, O
when O
this O
man O
finished O
his O
prayer O
and O
went O
home O
, O
he O
was O
right O
with O
God O
. O

But O
the O
Pharisee O
, O
who O
felt O
that O
he O
was O
better O
than O
others O
, O
was O
not O
right O
with O
God O
. O

People O
who O
make O
themselves O
important O
will O
be O
made O
humble O
. O

But O
those O
who O
make O
themselves O
humble O
will O
be O
made O
important O
. O
'' O

Some O
people O
brought O
their O
small O
children O
to O
Jesus O
so O
that O
he O
could O
lay O
his O
hands O
on O
them O
to O

the O
apostles O
came O
down O
from O
the O
mountain O
. O

Jesus O
stood O
on O
a O
flat O
place O
. O

A O
large O
crowd O
of O
his O
followers O
was O
there O
. O

Also O
, O
there O
were O
many O
people O
from O
all O
around O
Judea O
, O
Jerusalem O
, O
and O
the O
seacoast O
cities O
of O
Tyre O
and O
Sidon O
. O

They O
all O
came O
to O
hear O
Jesus O
teach O
and O
to O
be O
healed O
of O
their O
sicknesses O
. O

He O
healed O
the O
people O
who O
were O
troubled O
by O
evil O
spirits O
. O

Everyone O
was O
trying O
to O
touch O
him O
, O
because O
power O
was O
coming O
out O
from O
him O
. O

Jesus O
healed O
them O
all O
. O

Jesus O
looked O
at O
his O
followers O
and O
said O
, O
`` O
Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
you O
who O
are O
poor O
. O

God O
's O
kingdom O
belongs O
to O
you O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
you O
who O
are O
hungry O
now O
. O

You O
will O
be O
filled O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
you O
who O
are O
crying O
now O
. O

You O
will O
be O
happy O
and O
laughing O
. O

`` O
People O
will O
hate O
you O
because O
you O
belong O
to O
the O
Son O
of O
Man O
. O

They O
will O
make O
you O
leave O
their O
group O
. O

They O
will O
insult O
you O
. O

They O
will O
think O
it O
is O
wrong O
even O
to O
say O
your O
name O
. O

When O
these O
things O
happen O
, O
know O
that O
great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
you O
. O

You O
can O
be O
happy O
then O
and O
jump O
for O
joy O
, O
because O
you O
have O
a O
great O
reward O
in O
heaven O
. O

The O
ancestors O
of O
those O
people O
did O
the O
same O
things O
to O
the O

. O

`` O
But O
how O
bad O
it O
will O
be O
for O
you O
rich O
people O
, O
because O
you O
had O
your O
easy O

. O

How O

it O
will O
be O
for O
you O
people O
who O
are O
full O
now O
, O
because O
you O
will O
be O
hungry O
. O

How O
bad O
it O
will O
be O
for O
you O
people O
who O
are O
laughing O
now O
, O
because O
you O
will O
be O
sad O
and O
cry O
. O

`` O
How O
bad O
it O
is O
when O
everyone O
says O
nothing O
but O
good O
about O
you O
. O

Just O
look O
at O
the O
false O

. O

Their O
ancestors O
always O
said O
good O
things O
about O
them O
. O

`` O
But O
I O
say O
to O
you O
people O
who O
are O
listening O
to O
me O
, O
love O
your O
enemies O
. O

Do O
good O
to O
those O
who O

you O
. O

Ask O
God O
to O
bless O
the O
people O
who O
ask O
for O
bad O
things O
to O
happen O
to O
you O
. O

Pray O
for O
the O
people O
who O
are O
mean O
to O
you O
. O

If O
someone O
hits O
you O
on O
the O

, O
let O
them O
hit O
the O
other O
side O
too O
. O

If O
someone O
takes O
your O
coat O
, O
do O
n't O
stop O
them O
from O
taking O
your O
shirt O
too O
. O

Give O
to O
everyone O
who O
asks O
you O
for O
something O
. O

When O
someone O
takes O
something O
that O
is O
yours O
, O
do O
n't O
ask O
for O
it O
back O
. O

Do O
for O
others O
what O
you O
want O
them O
to O
do O
for O
you O
. O

`` O
If O
you O
love O
only O
those O
who O
love O
you O
, O
should O
you O
get O
any O
special O
praise O
for O
doing O
that O
? O

No O
, O
even O
sinners O
love O
those O
who O

! O

If O
you O
do O
good O
only O
to O
those O
who O
do O
good O
to O
you O
, O
should O
you O
get O
any O
special O

for O

? O

No O
, O
even O

do O
that O
! O

If O
you O
lend O

to O
people O
, O
always O
expecting O
to O
get O
something O
back O
, O
should O
you O
get O

special O

for O

? O

No O
, O
even O
sinners O
lend O
to O
other O
sinners O
so O
that O
they O
can O
get O
back O
the O
same O
amount O
! O

`` O
I O
'm O
telling O
you O
to O

your O

and O
do O
good O
to O

. O

Lend O
to O

without O

to O

anything O

. O

If O

, O

will O

a O

. O

You O
will O
be O
children O
of O
the O
Most O
High O
God O
. O

Yes O
, O
because O
God O
is O
good O
even O
to O
the O
people O
who O
are O
full O
of O
sin O
and O
not O

. O

Give O
love O
and O

the O
same O
as O
your O
Father O
gives O
love O
and O
mercy O
. O

`` O
Do O
n't O
judge O
others O
, O
and O
God O
will O
not O
judge O
you O
. O

Do O
n't O
condemn O
others O
, O
and O
you O
will O
not O
be O
condemned O
. O

Forgive O
others O
, O
and O
you O
will O
be O
forgiven O
. O

Give O
to O
others O
, O
and O
you O
will O
receive O
. O

You O
will O
be O
given O
much O
. O

It O
will O
be O
poured O
into O
your O
hands O
-- O
more O
than O
you O
can O
hold O
. O

You O
will O
be O
given O
so O
much O
that O
it O
will O
spill O
into O
your O
lap O
. O

The O
way O
you O
give O
to O
others O
is O
the O
way O
God O
will O
give O
to O
you O
. O
'' O

Jesus O
told O
them O
this O
story O
: O
`` O
Can O
a O
blind O
man O
lead O
another O
blind O
man O
? O

No O
. O
Both O
of O
them O
will O
fall O
into O
a O
ditch O
. O

Students O
are O
not O
better O
than O
their O
teacher O
. O

But O
when O
they O
have O
been O
fully O
taught O
, O
they O
will O
be O
like O
their O
teacher O
. O

`` O
Why O
do O
you O
notice O
the O

piece O
of O
dust O
that O
is O
in O
your O
friend O
's O
eye O
, O
but O
you O
do O
n't O
see O
the O
big O
piece O
of O
wood O
that O
is O
in O
your O
own O
eye O
? O

You O
say O
to O

friend O
, O
' O
Let O
me O
get O
that O
little O
piece O
of O
dust O
out O
of O
your O
eye O
. O
' O

Why O
do O
you O
say O
this O
? O

Ca O
n't O
you O
see O
that O
big O
piece O
of O
wood O
in O
your O
own O
eye O
? O

You O
are O
a O
hypocrite O
. O

First O
, O
take O
the O
wood O
out O
of O
your O
own O
eye O
. O

Then O
you O
will O
see O
clearly O
to O
get O
the O
dust O
out O
of O
your O
friend O
's O
eye O
. O

`` O
A O
good O
tree O
does O
not O
produce O
bad O
fruit O
. O

And O
a O
bad O
tree O
does O
not O
produce O
good O
fruit O
. O

Every O
tree O
is O
known O
by O
the O
kind O
of O
fruit O
it O
produces O
. O

You O
wo O
n't O
find O
figs O
on O
thorny O
weeds O
. O

And O
you O
ca O
n't O
pick O
grapes O
from O
thornbushes O
! O

Good O
people O
have O
good O
things O
saved O
in O
their O
hearts O
. O

That O
's O
why O
they O
say O
good O
things O
. O

But O
those O
who O
are O
evil O
have O
hearts O
full O
of O
evil O
, O
and O
that O
's O
why O
they O
say O
things O
that O
are O
evil O
. O

What O
people O
say O
with O
their O
mouths O
comes O
from O
what O
fills O
their O
hearts O
. O

`` O
Why O
do O
you O
call O
me O
, O
' O
Lord O
, O
Lord O
, O
' O
but O
you O
do O
n't O
do O
what O
I O
say O
? O

The O
people O
who O
come O
to O
me O
, O
who O
listen O
to O
my O
teachings O
and O
obey O
them O
-- O
I O
will O
show O
you O
what O
they O
are O
like O
: O
They O
are O
like O
a O
man O
building O
a O
house O
. O

He O
digs O
deep O
and O
builds O
his O
house O
on O
rock O
. O

The O
floods O
come O
, O
and O
the O
water O
crashes O
against O
the O
house O
. O

But O
the O

can O
not O
move O
the O
house O
, O
because O
it O
was O
built O
well O
. O

`` O
But O
the O
people O
who O

my O
words O
and O
do O
not O
obey O
are O
like O
a O
man O
who O
builds O

house O
without O
preparing O
a O

. O

When O
the O
floods O
come O
, O
the O
house O
falls O
down O
easily O
and O
is O
completely O
destroyed O
. O
'' O

Now O
filled O
with O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
Jesus O
returned O
from O
the O
Jordan O
River O
. O

And O
then O
the O

led O
him O
into O
the O

. O

There O
the O
devil O
tempted O
Jesus O
for O
40 O
days O
. O

Jesus O
ate O
nothing O
during O
this O
time O
, O
and O
when O

was O
finished O
, O

was O

. O

said O

, O
`` O
If O

, O

, O
`` O

, O
' O

. O

. O

, O
`` O

king O

. O

You O

, O

. O

It O

. O

I O

, O
' O

. O

Serve O

. O

area O
. O

He O

, O
`` O
If O
you O
are O

, O

! O

, O
' O

. O

It O

Their O

, O

. O

The O

finished O

to O

until O
a O

. O

Jesus O
went O
back O
to O

with O
the O
power O
of O

. O

Stories O
about O

over O
the O

around O

. O

He O
began O
to O

in O

, O
and O
everyone O

him O
. O

Jesus O
traveled O
to O
Nazareth O
, O
the O
town O
where O
he O

up O
. O

On O
the O
Sabbath O
day O
he O
went O
to O
the O

as O

always O

. O

He O
stood O
up O
to O
read O
. O

The O
book O
of O
Isaiah O
the O
prophet O
was O
given O
to O
him O
. O

He O
opened O
the O
book O
and O
found O
the O
place O
where O
this O
is O
written O
: O
`` O
The O
Spirit O
of O
the O
Lord O
is O
on O
me O
. O

He O
has O
chosen O
me O
to O
tell O

to O

. O

He O
sent O

to O

that O
they O

free O
and O
to O
tell O
the O
blind O
that O
they O
can O
see O
again O
. O

He O
sent O
me O
to O
free O
those O
who O
have O
been O
treated O
badly O
and O
to O
announce O
that O
the O

has O
come O
for O

to O

. O
'' O

Jesus O
closed O
the O

, O

it O
back O
to O

, O
and O

down O
. O

As O
everyone O
in O

watched O

closely O
, O

to O

to O

. O

He O
said O
, O
`` O
While O
you O
heard O
me O
reading O
these O
words O
just O
now O
, O
they O
were O
coming O
true O
! O
'' O

Everyone O
there O
said O
good O
things O
about O
Jesus O
. O

They O
were O

to O

speak O
such O

. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
How O
is O
this O
possible O
? O

Is O
n't O
he O
Joseph O
's O
son O
? O
'' O

Jesus O
said O
to O

, O
`` O
I O
know O
you O
will O
tell O
me O
the O
old O
saying O
: O
' O
Doctor O
, O

. O
' O

You O
want O

, O
' O
We O
heard O

the O

you O

in O
Capernaum O
. O

Do O
those O
same O
things O
here O
in O
your O
own O
hometown O
! O
' O
'' O

Then O
he O
said O
, O
`` O
The O
truth O
is O
, O
a O
prophet O
is O
not O
accepted O
in O
his O
own O
hometown O
. O

`` O
During O
the O
time O
of O
Elijah O
it O
did O
not O
rain O
in O
Israel O
for O
three O
and O
a O
half O
years O
. O

There O
was O
no O

anywhere O
in O
the O
whole O
country O
. O

There O
were O
many O
widows O
in O
Israel O
during O
that O

. O

But O
the O
fact O
is O
, O
Elijah O
was O
sent O
to O
none O
of O
those O
widows O
in O
Israel O
. O

He O
was O
sent O
only O
to O
a O
widow O
in O
Zarephath O
, O
a O
town O
in O
Sidon O
. O

`` O
And O
there O
were O
many O
people O
with O
leprosy O
living O
in O
Israel O
during O
the O
time O
of O
the O

. O

But O
none O
of O

were O
healed O
; O
the O
only O
one O
was O
Naaman O
. O

And O
he O
was O
from O
the O
country O
of O
Syria O
, O
not O
Israel O
. O
'' O

When O
the O
people O
in O
the O
synagogue O
heard O
this O
, O
they O
were O
very O
angry O
. O

They O
got O
up O
and O
forced O
Jesus O
to O
go O
out O
of O
town O
. O

Their O
town O
was O
built O
on O
a O
hill O
. O

They O
took O
Jesus O
to O
the O
edge O
of O
the O
hill O
to O
throw O
him O
off O
. O

But O
he O
walked O
through O
the O
middle O
of O
the O
crowd O
and O
went O
away O
. O

Jesus O
went O
to O
Capernaum O
, O
a O
city O
in O
Galilee O
. O

On O
the O
Sabbath O
day O
he O
taught O
the O
people O
. O

They O
were O
amazed O
at O
his O
teaching O
because O
he O
spoke O
with O
authority O
. O

In O
the O
synagogue O
there O
was O
a O
man O
who O
had O
an O
evil O
spirit O

men O
guarding O
Jesus O
made O
fun O
of O
him O
and O
beat O
him O
. O

They O
covered O
his O
eyes O
so O
that O
he O
could O
not O
see O
them O
. O

Then O
they O
hit O
him O
and O
said O
, O
`` O
Be O
a O
prophet O
and O
tell O
us O
who O
hit O
you O
! O
'' O

And O
they O
shouted O
all O
kinds O
of O
insults O
at O
him O
. O

The O
next O
morning O
, O
the O
older O
leaders O
of O
the O
people O
, O
the O
leading O
priests O
, O
and O
the O

of O
the O

came O
together O
. O

They O
led O
Jesus O
away O
to O
their O
high O

. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
If O
you O
are O

Christ O
, O

that O

. O
'' O

Jesus O

to O

, O
`` O
If O
I O
tell O

, O

will O
not O

. O

And O
if O

, O

will O
not O

. O

But O

now O
, O
the O
Son O
of O
Man O
will O
sit O
at O
the O

of O

All O
- O

. O
'' O

all O

, O
`` O
Then O
are O

the O

of O

? O
'' O

Jesus O
said O
to O

, O
`` O
You O
are O

in O

that O
I O
am O
. O
'' O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
Why O
do O
we O
need O
witnesses O
now O
? O

We O
all O
heard O
what O
he O
said O
! O
'' O

On O
a O

day O
, O
Jesus O
went O
to O
the O
home O
of O
a O
leading O
Pharisee O
to O
eat O
with O

. O

The O
people O
there O
were O
all O
watching O
him O
very O
closely O
. O

A O
man O
with O
a O
bad O
disease O
was O
there O
in O

of O

. O

said O
to O

and O

in O

, O
`` O

or O

on O

? O
'' O

But O

. O

So O

took O
the O
man O
and O
healed O
him O
. O

Then O
he O
sent O
the O
man O
away O
. O

to O
the O

of O
the O

If O

, O

. O
'' O

The O

and O

of O
the O
law O

against O
what O

. O

noticed O
that O

. O

: O
`` O

. O

, O

, O

. O

. O

. O

. O

Many O

. O

, O
`` O
If O

, O

, O

, O

, O

, O

! O

Whoever O

not O

that O
is O
given O
to O
them O
when O

follow O

can O
not O

. O

`` O
If O

to O

, O

and O

. O

to O

. O

, O

. O

And O

, O

. O

. O

, O

who O

, O

. O

. O

. O

`` O

, O

ca O

. O

ca O

. O

. O

`` O

, O

! O
'' O

One O

: O
' O

, O

. O

We O

. O

. O

And O

. O
' O
'' O

Then O
Jesus O
said O
to O
them O
, O
`` O
Suppose O

's O

and O

, O
A O

But O

. O

. O
' O

Your O

, O
' O

! O

Do O

! O

to O

. O

But O

will O

to O

what O

if O
you O
continue O
to O

. O

So O
I O
tell O
you O
, O
continue O
to O
ask O
, O
and O
God O
will O
give O
to O
you O
. O

Continue O
to O
search O
, O
and O
you O
will O
find O
. O

Continue O
to O
knock O
, O
and O
the O
door O
will O
open O
for O
you O
. O

Yes O
, O
whoever O
continues O
to O
ask O
will O
receive O
. O

Whoever O
continues O
to O
look O
will O
find O
. O

And O
whoever O
continues O
to O
knock O
will O
have O
the O
door O
opened O
for O
them O
. O

Do O
any O
of O
you O
have O
a O
son O
? O

What O
would O
you O
do O
if O
your O
son O
asked O
you O
for O
a O
fish O
? O

Would O
any O
father O
give O
him O
a O
snake O
? O

Or O
, O
if O
he O
asked O
for O
an O
egg O
, O
would O
you O
give O
him O
a O

? O

Of O
course O
not O
! O

Even O
you O
who O
are O
bad O
know O
how O
to O
give O
good O
things O
to O
your O
children O
. O

So O
surely O
your O

Father O
knows O
how O
to O
give O
the O
Holy O
Spirit O
to O
the O
people O
who O
ask O
him O
. O
'' O

One O
time O
Jesus O
was O
sending O
a O
demon O
out O
of O
a O
man O
who O
could O
not O
talk O
. O

When O

came O
out O
, O
the O
man O
was O
able O
to O
speak O
. O

The O
crowds O
were O
amazed O
. O

But O
some O
of O
the O
people O
said O
, O
`` O
He O
uses O
the O

of O
Satan O
to O
force O
demons O
out O
of O

. O

Satan O
is O
the O

of O

. O
'' O

Some O

there O
wanted O
to O

Jesus O
. O

They O
asked O
him O
to O
do O
a O
miracle O
as O
a O

from O
God O
. O

But O
he O
knew O
what O
they O
were O
thinking O
. O

So O
he O
said O
to O
them O
, O
`` O
Every O
kingdom O
that O
fights O
against O
itself O
will O
be O
destroyed O
. O

And O
a O
family O
that O
fights O
against O
itself O
will O
break O
apart O
. O

So O
if O
Satan O
is O
fighting O
against O
himself O
, O
how O
will O
his O
kingdom O
survive O
? O

You O
say O
that O
I O
use O
the O
power O
of O
Satan O
to O
force O
out O
demons O
. O

But O
if O
I O
use O
Satan O
's O
power O
to O
force O
out O
demons O
, O
then O
what O
power O
do O
your O
people O
use O
when O
they O
force O
out O

? O

So O
your O
own O
people O
will O
prove O
that O
you O
are O
wrong O
. O

But O
I O
use O
the O
power O
of O
God O
to O
force O
out O
demons O
. O

This O
shows O
that O
God O
's O
kingdom O
has O
come O
to O
you O
. O

`` O
When O
a O
strong O
man O
with O
many O
weapons O
guards O
his O
own O
house O
, O
the O
things O
in O
his O
house O
are O
safe O
. O

But O
suppose O
a O
stronger O
man O
comes O
and O
defeats O
him O
. O

The O
stronger O
man O
will O
take O
away O
the O
weapons O
that O
the O
first O
man O
trusted O
to O
keep O
his O
house O
safe O
. O

Then O
the O
stronger O
man O
will O
do O
what O
he O
wants O
with O
the O
other O
man O
's O
things O
. O

`` O
Whoever O
is O
not O
with O
me O
is O
against O
me O
. O

And O
anyone O
who O
does O
not O
work O
with O
me O
is O
working O
against O
me O
. O

`` O
When O
an O
evil O
spirit O
comes O
out O
of O
someone O
, O
it O
travels O
through O
dry O
places O
, O
looking O
for O
a O
place O
to O
rest O
. O

But O
it O
finds O
no O
place O
to O
rest O
. O

So O

back O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O
'' O

During O

area O
. O

. O

, O

. O

`` O

, O

. O

. O

. O

's O

, O

. O

Slaves O
, O

to O

your O

. O

Do O

. O

You O
should O

who O

, O

. O

. O

If O

, O

. O

But O

, O

, O

to O

in O

. O

. O

Another O

, O

. O

. O

. O

One O

included O
this O

: O
`` O
Listen O
! O

A O

went O

. O

While O

, O

. O

. O

, O

. O

. O

But O

. O

. O

. O

. O

because O

people O
there O
did O
not O
change O
their O
lives O
and O
stop O
sinning O
. O

Jesus O
said O
, O
`` O
It O
will O
be O
bad O
for O
you O
Chorazin O
! O

It O
will O
be O
bad O
for O
you O
Bethsaida O
! O

I O
did O
many O
miracles O
in O
you O
. O

If O
these O
same O
miracles O
had O
happened O
in O
Tyre O
and O
Sidon O
, O
the O
people O
there O
would O
have O
changed O
their O

a O
long O

ago O
. O

They O
would O
have O
worn O

and O
put O
ashes O
on O
themselves O
to O
show O
that O
they O
were O
sorry O
for O

. O

But O

, O
on O
the O

of O
judgment O
it O
will O
be O
worse O
for O
you O
than O

. O

`` O

you O
, O

, O
will O

to O

? O

No O
! O

You O
will O

down O
to O
the O

of O
death O
. O

I O
did O
many O
miracles O
in O
you O
. O

If O
these O

had O

in O

, O
the O

have O

, O

a O

. O

But O
I O
tell O
you O
, O
it O
will O
be O

for O
you O
in O
the O
day O
of O
judgment O
than O
for O
Sodom O
. O
'' O

Then O

said O
, O
`` O
I O

, O

, O

of O

, O

, O

has O

. O

No O

-- O
only O

. O

-- O

. O

. O

Then O

. O

Father O
and O

more O
than O

. O

But O
it O
must O
happen O
this O
way O
to O

what O
the O
Scriptures O
said O
. O

said O
to O

, O
`` O

to O

. O

fully O
satisfy O
them O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
those O
who O
show O
mercy O
to O
others O
. O

Mercy O
will O
be O
given O
to O
them O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
those O
whose O
thoughts O
are O
pure O
. O

They O
will O
be O
with O
God O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
those O
who O
work O
to O
bring O
peace O
. O

God O
will O
call O
them O
his O
sons O
and O
daughters O
. O

Great O
blessings O
belong O
to O
those O
who O
suffer O
persecution O
for O
doing O
what O
is O
right O
. O

God O
's O
kingdom O
belongs O
to O
them O
. O

`` O
People O
will O
insult O
you O
and O

you O
. O

They O
will O
lie O
and O
say O
all O
kinds O
of O
evil O

about O

because O

. O

But O

do O

, O

that O

belong O
to O
you O
. O

Be O

about O

. O

because O

in O

. O

People O
did O

the O

who O
lived O
before O

. O

`` O
You O
are O
the O

of O

. O

But O

, O

salty O

. O

. O

It O

out O

. O

`` O

are O

. O

You O

. O

. O

. O

. O

, O

. O

Live O

in O

. O

`` O

n't O

that O
I O
have O

. O

. O

The O

`` O

, O

. O

. O

`` O

It O

`` O
You O
have O

was O

, O
' O

, O

be O
children O
who O

like O
your O
Father O
in O

. O

He O
lets O

rise O

, O

. O

He O

. O

If O

? O

Even O

than O

else O
. O

Even O

who O
do O
n't O
know O
God O
are O

to O

. O

What O
I O
am O

is O
that O
you O
must O
be O
perfect O
, O
just O
as O
your O
Father O
in O
heaven O
is O
perfect O
. O

Jesus O
was O
born O
in O
the O
town O
of O
Bethlehem O
in O
Judea O
during O
the O
time O
when O
Herod O
was O
king O
. O

After O
Jesus O
was O
born O
, O
some O
wise O
men O
from O
the O
east O
came O
to O
Jerusalem O
. O

They O
asked O
people O
, O
`` O
Where O
is O
the O
child O
who O
has O
been O
born O
to O

the O
king O
of O
the O
Jews O
? O

We O
saw O
the O
star O
that O
shows O
he O
was O
born O
. O

We O
saw O
it O
rise O
in O
the O
sky O
in O
the O
east O
and O
have O
come O
to O
worship O
him O
. O
'' O

When O

Herod O
heard O
about O
this O
, O

upset O

as O

as O

in O

. O

called O

. O

. O

, O
`` O

, O

: O
' O

, O

important O
among O

. O

Yes O
, O
a O

from O

, O

, O

. O

'' O

Then O

had O

. O

He O
learned O
from O
them O

. O

Then O

. O

He O

, O
`` O

. O

, O

. O

Then O

can O

. O

After O

They O

The O

. O

They O

and O

. O

. O

, O

, O

. O

. O

So O

. O

After O

, O
`` O

! O

. O

They O

. O

Joseph O
stayed O
in O

until O
Herod O
died O
. O

This O
gave O
full O
meaning O
to O
what O

Lord O
said O
through O
the O

: O
`` O

I O

. O

Herod O
saw O
that O

, O

was O
very O

. O

So O

to O

and O

. O

Herod O
had O

from O

wise O

the O

was O
born O
. O

It O
was O
now O
two O

from O
that O

. O

So O
he O
said O
to O
kill O
all O
the O
boys O
who O
were O
two O
years O
old O
and O
younger O
. O

This O
gave O
full O
meaning O
to O
what O
God O
said O
through O
the O

Jeremiah O
: O
`` O
A O

was O

in O
Ramah O
-- O
bitter O

and O

. O

Rachel O

, O
and O

, O

. O
'' O

While O

, O

. O

An O

came O

in O

, O
`` O
Get O

! O

Take O
the O
child O
with O
his O
mother O
and O
go O
to O
Israel O
. O

Those O
who O
were O
trying O
to O
kill O
the O
child O
are O
now O
dead O
. O
'' O

So O
Joseph O
took O
the O
child O
and O
the O
mother O
and O
went O
to O
Israel O
. O

But O
he O
heard O
that O
Archelaus O
was O
now O
king O
in O
Judea O
. O

Archelaus O
became O
king O
when O
his O
father O
Herod O
died O
. O

So O
Joseph O
was O
afraid O
to O
go O
there O
. O

Then O
, O
after O
being O
warned O
in O
a O
dream O
, O
he O
went O
away O
to O
the O
area O
of O
Galilee O
. O

He O
went O
to O
a O
town O
called O
Nazareth O
and O
lived O
there O
. O

This O
gave O
full O
meaning O
to O
what O
God O
said O
through O
the O
prophets O
. O

God O
said O
the O
Christ O
would O
be O
called O
a O
Nazarene O
. O

That O
same O
day O
Jesus O
went O
out O
of O
the O
house O
and O
sat O
by O
the O
lake O
. O

A O
large O
crowd O
gathered O
around O
him O
. O

So O
he O
got O
into O
a O
boat O
and O
sat O
down O
. O

All O
the O
people O
stayed O
on O
the O
shore O
. O

Then O
Jesus O
used O
stories O
to O
teach O
them O
many O
things O
. O

He O
told O
them O
this O
story O
: O
`` O
A O
farmer O
went O
out O
to O
sow O
seed O
. O

While O
he O
was O
scattering O
the O
seed O
, O
some O
of O
it O
fell O
by O
the O
road O
. O

The O
birds O
came O
and O
ate O
all O
that O
seed O
. O

Other O
seed O
fell O
on O
rocky O
ground O
, O
where O
there O
was O
not O
enough O
dirt O
. O

It O
grew O
very O
fast O
there O
, O
because O
the O
soil O
was O
not O
deep O
. O

But O
when O
the O
sun O
rose O
, O
it O
burned O
the O
plants O
. O

The O
plants O
died O
because O
they O
did O
not O
have O
deep O
roots O
. O

Some O
other O
seed O
fell O
among O
thorny O
weeds O
. O

The O
weeds O
grew O
and O
stopped O
the O
good O
plants O
from O
growing O
. O

But O
some O
of O
the O
seed O
fell O
on O
good O
ground O
. O

There O
it O
grew O
and O
made O
grain O
. O

Some O
plants O
made O
100 O
times O
more O
grain O
, O
some O
60 O
times O
more O
, O
and O
some O
30 O
times O
more O
. O

You O
people O
who O
hear O
me O
, O
listen O
! O
'' O

followers O
came O
to O
Jesus O
and O

, O
`` O

do O
you O
use O
these O
stories O
to O

? O

Jesus O
answered O
, O
`` O

can O

about O

's O

. O

Those O

can O

. O

The O

who O

. O

And O

. O

: O
They O

, O

. O

. O

: O
' O

, O

. O

You O
will O

and O

, O

. O

Yes O
, O

are O
now O

. O

They O

, O

. O

. O

; O

. O

But O

. O

. O

, O

's O

. O

. O

. O

. O

will O
shine O
like O

. O

They O

be O
in O

. O

You O

who O

me O
, O

! O

`` O

's O

is O
like O

. O

. O

. O

, O

. O

. O

, O

's O

. O

? O

. O

But O

said O
to O

, O
`` O
People O
everywhere O
give O

to O

, O

or O

'' O

Jesus O
did O
not O

, O

in O
him O
. O

Then O

and O

the O
law O

. O

They O
came O
from O

, O

not O

? O

Your O

do O

! O
'' O

, O
`` O

so O
that O

, O
' O
You O
must O

. O
' O

And O

also O

, O
' O
Whoever O

When O
Jesus O
heard O
this O
, O
he O
was O
amazed O
. O

He O
said O
to O
those O
who O
were O
with O
him O
, O
`` O
The O
truth O
is O
, O
this O
man O
has O
more O
faith O
than O
anyone O
I O
have O
found O
, O
even O
in O
Israel O
. O

Many O
people O
will O
come O
from O
the O
east O
and O
from O
the O
west O
. O

These O
people O
will O
sit O
and O
eat O
with O
Abraham O
, O
Isaac O
, O
and O

in O
God O
's O
kingdom O
. O

And O

who O
should O
have O
the O
kingdom O
will O
be O

out O
. O

They O
will O
be O

outside O
into O
the O

, O
where O
people O
will O
cry O
and O

. O
'' O

said O
to O

, O
`` O

. O

Your O
servant O
will O
be O
healed O
the O

. O
'' O

Right O

. O

Jesus O
went O
to O

's O

. O

's O

- O

- O

. O

, O
and O

left O

. O

Then O

and O

to O

. O

That O

people O
brought O
to O
Jesus O
many O

who O

inside O

. O

He O

and O

. O

who O

. O

So O

of O

the O

: O
`` O
He O

and O

. O
'' O

When O

, O

to O

. O

, O
`` O

, O

, O
`` O

. O

The O

. O

But O

. O

. O

After O

, O

on O

. O

The O

covered O

. O

But O

was O

. O

. O

! O

! O
'' O

, O
`` O

? O

do O

have O
enough O

. O
'' O

Then O
he O

and O

a O
command O
to O
the O
wind O
and O
the O
water O
. O

The O
wind O
stopped O
, O
and O

lake O
became O
very O
calm O
. O

The O
men O
were O

. O

They O
said O
, O
`` O
What O
kind O
of O

is O

? O

and O

obey O

! O
'' O

Jesus O
arrived O
at O
the O

side O
of O

in O
the O

of O

. O

There O
, O
two O
men O
who O

demons O
inside O

. O

They O
lived O
in O

and O

so O

that O
no O

. O

They O

, O
`` O
What O

with O

, O
Son O
of O

? O

Did O

? O
'' O

Near O

there O
was O

. O

The O

, O
`` O

, O

of O

. O
'' O

to O

, O
`` O
Go O
! O
'' O

So O

demons O
left O
the O
men O
and O
went O
into O
the O
pigs O
. O

Then O
the O
whole O

of O

down O
the O
hill O

, O
and O
all O

. O

The O

of O

for O

ran O

. O

They O
went O
into O

the O
people O
everything O
that O
happened O
, O
especially O
about O
the O
men O
who O
had O
the O
demons O
. O

Then O
the O
whole O
town O
went O
out O
to O
see O
Jesus O
. O

When O
the O
people O
saw O
him O
, O
they O
begged O
him O
to O
leave O
their O
area O
. O

`` O
Be O
careful O
! O

When O
you O
do O
something O
good O
, O
do O
n't O
do O
it O
in O
front O
of O
others O
so O
that O
they O
will O
see O
you O
. O

If O
you O
do O
that O
, O
you O
will O
have O
no O
reward O
from O
your O
Father O
in O
heaven O
. O

`` O
When O
you O
give O
to O
those O
who O
are O
poor O
, O
do O
n't O
announce O
that O
you O
are O
giving O
. O

Do O
n't O
be O
like O
the O
hypocrites O
. O

When O
they O
are O
in O
the O
synagogues O
and O
on O
the O
streets O
, O
they O
blow O
trumpets O
before O
they O
give O
so O
that O
people O
will O
see O
them O
. O

They O
want O
everyone O
to O
praise O
them O
. O

The O
truth O
is O
, O
that O
's O
all O
the O
reward O
they O
will O
get O
. O

So O
when O
you O
give O
to O
the O
poor O
, O
do O
n't O
let O
anyone O
know O
what O
you O
are O
doing O
. O

Your O
giving O
should O
be O
done O
in O
private O
. O

Your O
Father O
can O
see O
what O
is O
done O
in O
private O
, O
and O
he O
will O
reward O
you O
. O

`` O
When O
you O
pray O
, O
do O
n't O
be O
like O
the O
hypocrites O
. O

They O
love O
to O
stand O
in O
the O
synagogues O
and O
on O
the O
street O
corners O
and O
pray O
loudly O
. O

They O
want O
people O
to O
see O
them O
. O

The O
truth O
is O
, O
that O
's O
all O
the O
reward O
they O
will O
get O
. O

But O
when O
you O
pray O
, O
you O
should O
go O
into O
your O
room O
and O
close O
the O
door O
. O

Then O
pray O
to O
your O
Father O
. O

He O
is O
there O
in O
that O
private O
place O
. O

He O
can O
see O
what O
is O
done O
in O
private O
, O
and O
he O
will O
reward O
you O
. O

`` O
And O
when O
you O
pray O
, O
do O
n't O
be O
like O
the O
people O
who O
do O
n't O
know O
God O
. O

They O
say O
the O
same O

again O
and O
again O
. O

They O
think O
that O
if O

say O
it O
enough O
, O
their O
god O
will O
hear O
them O
. O

Do O
n't O
be O
like O
them O
. O

Your O
Father O
knows O
what O
you O
need O
before O
you O
ask O
him O
. O

So O
this O
is O
how O
you O
should O

: O
' O
Our O
Father O
in O
heaven O
, O
we O

that O
your O

will O
always O

. O

We O

that O

will O

-- O

you O

will O
be O
done O
here O
on O

, O
the O
same O
as O
in O

. O

Give O
us O
the O
food O
we O
need O
for O
today O
. O

Forgive O
our O
sins O
, O
just O
as O
we O
have O
forgiven O
those O
who O
did O
wrong O
to O
us O
. O

Do O
n't O
let O
us O
be O
tempted O
, O
but O
save O
us O
from O
the O
Evil O
One O
. O
' O

Yes O
, O
if O

others O
for O

they O
do O
to O

, O
then O
your O

in O

your O

. O

But O

do O

others O
, O
then O
your O
Father O
in O
heaven O
will O
not O
forgive O
the O
wrongs O
you O
do O
. O

`` O
When O
you O
fast O
, O
do O
n't O
make O
yourselves O
look O
sad O
like O
the O
hypocrites O
. O

They O
put O
a O

of O

on O
their O
faces O
so O
that O
people O
will O
see O
they O
are O

. O

The O

is O
, O
that O
's O
all O
the O

they O
will O
get O
. O

So O
when O
you O
fast O
, O
wash O
your O

and O
make O
yourself O
look O
nice O
. O

Then O
no O
one O
will O
know O
you O
are O
fasting O
, O
except O
your O
Father O
, O
who O
is O
with O
you O
even O
in O
private O
. O

He O
can O
see O
what O
is O
done O
in O
private O
, O
and O
he O
will O
reward O
you O
. O

`` O
Do O
n't O
save O
treasures O
for O
yourselves O
here O
on O
earth O
. O

Moths O
and O
rust O
will O
destroy O
them O
. O

And O
thieves O
can O
break O
into O
your O
house O
and O

. O

Instead O
, O
save O
your O

in O
heaven O
, O
where O
they O
can O
not O
be O
destroyed O
by O
moths O
or O
rust O
and O
where O
thieves O
can O
not O
break O
in O
and O
steal O
them O
. O

Your O
heart O
will O
be O
where O
your O
treasure O
is O
. O

`` O
The O
only O
source O
of O
light O
for O
the O
body O
is O
the O
eye O
. O

If O
you O
look O
at O
people O
and O
want O
to O
help O
them O
, O
you O
will O
be O
full O
of O
light O
. O

But O
if O
you O
look O
at O
people O
in O
a O
selfish O
way O
, O
you O
will O
be O
full O
of O
darkness O
. O

And O
if O
the O
only O
light O
you O
have O
is O
really O
darkness O
, O
you O
have O
the O
worst O
kind O
of O
darkness O
. O

`` O
You O
can O
not O
serve O
two O
masters O
at O
the O
same O
time O
. O

You O
will O
hate O
one O
and O
love O
the O
other O
, O
or O
you O
will O
be O
loyal O
to O
one O
and O
not O
care O
about O
the O
other O
. O

You O
can O
not O
serve O
God O
and O
Money O
at O
the O
same O
time O
. O

`` O
So O
I O
tell O
you O
, O
do O
n't O
worry O
about O
the O
things O
you O
need O
to O
live O
-- O
what O
you O
will O
eat O
, O
drink O
, O
or O
wear O
. O

Life O
is O
more O
important O
than O
food O
, O
and O
the O
body O
is O
more O
important O
than O
what O
you O
put O
on O
it O
. O

Look O
at O
the O
birds O
. O

They O
do O
n't O
plant O
, O
harvest O
, O
or O
save O
food O
in O
barns O
, O
but O
your O

Father O
feeds O
them O
. O

Do O
n't O
you O
know O
you O
are O
worth O
much O
more O
than O
they O
are O
? O

You O
can O
not O
add O
any O
time O
to O
your O
life O
by O
worrying O
about O
it O
. O

`` O
And O
why O
do O
you O
worry O
about O
clothes O
? O

Look O
at O
the O
wildflowers O
in O
the O
field O
. O

See O
how O
they O
grow O
. O

They O
do O
n't O
work O
or O
make O
clothes O
for O
themselves O
. O

But O
I O
tell O

that O
even O
Solomon O
, O
the O
great O
and O
rich O
king O
, O
was O
not O
dressed O
as O

as O
one O
of O
these O
flowers O
. O

If O
God O
makes O
what O
grows O
in O
the O
field O
so O
beautiful O
, O
what O
do O
you O
think O
he O
will O
do O
for O
you O
? O

It O
's O
just O
grass O
-- O
one O
day O
it O
's O
alive O
, O
and O
the O
next O
day O
someone O
throws O
it O
into O
a O

. O

But O
God O
cares O
enough O
to O
make O
it O
beautiful O
. O

Surely O
he O
will O
do O
much O
more O
for O
you O
. O

Your O
faith O
is O
so O
small O
! O

`` O
Do O
n't O
worry O
and O
say O
, O
' O
What O
will O
we O
eat O
? O
' O

or O
' O
What O
will O
we O
drink O
? O
' O

or O
' O
What O
will O
we O
wear O
? O
' O

That O
's O
what O
those O
people O
who O
do O
n't O
know O
God O
are O
always O
thinking O
about O
. O

Do O
n't O
worry O
, O
because O
your O
Father O
in O
heaven O
knows O
that O
you O
need O
all O
these O
things O
. O

What O
you O
should O
want O
most O
is O
God O
's O
kingdom O
and O
doing O
what O
he O
wants O
you O
to O
do O
. O

Then O
he O
will O
give O
you O
all O
these O
other O
things O
you O
need O
. O

So O
do O
n't O
worry O
about O
tomorrow O
. O

Each O
day O
has O
enough O
trouble O
of O
its O
own O
. O

Tomorrow O
will O
have O
its O
own O
worries O
. O

Then O
Jesus O
spoke O
to O
the O
people O
and O
to O
his O
followers O
. O

He O
said O
, O
`` O
The O
teachers O
of O
the O
law O
and O
the O
Pharisees O
have O
the O
authority O
to O
tell O
you O
what O
the O
Law O
of O
Moses O
says O
. O

So O
you O
should O
obey O
them O
. O

Do O
everything O
they O
tell O
you O
to O
do O
. O

But O
their O
lives O
are O
not O
good O
examples O
for O
you O
to O
follow O
. O

They O
tell O
you O
to O
do O
things O
, O
but O
they O
do O
n't O
do O
those O
things O
themselves O
. O

They O
make O
strict O
rules O
that O
are O
hard O
for O
people O
to O
obey O
. O

They O
try O
to O
force O
others O
to O
obey O
all O
their O
rules O
. O

But O
they O
themselves O
will O
not O
try O
to O
follow O
any O
of O
those O
rules O
. O

`` O
The O
only O
reason O
they O
do O
what O
they O
do O
is O
for O
other O
people O
to O
see O
them O
. O

They O
make O
the O
little O
Scripture O
boxes O
they O
wear O
bigger O
and O
bigger O
. O

And O
they O
make O
the O
tassels O
on O
their O
prayer O
clothes O
long O
enough O
for O
people O
to O
notice O
them O
. O

These O
men O
love O
to O
have O
the O
places O
of O
honor O
at O
banquets O
and O
the O
most O
important O
seats O
in O
the O
synagogues O
. O

They O
love O
for O
people O
to O
show O
respect O
to O
them O
in O
the O
marketplaces O
and O
to O
call O
them O
' O
Teacher O
. O
' O

`` O
But O
you O
must O
not O
be O
called O
' O
Teacher O
. O
' O

You O
are O
all O
equal O
as O
brothers O
and O
sisters O
. O

You O
have O
only O
one O
Teacher O
. O

And O
do O
n't O
call O
anyone O
on O
earth O
' O
Father O
. O
' O

You O
have O
one O
Father O
. O

He O
is O
in O
heaven O
. O

And O
you O
should O
not O
be O
called O
' O
Master O
. O
' O

You O
have O
only O
one O
Master O
, O
the O
Christ O
. O

Whoever O
serves O
you O
like O
a O
servant O
is O
the O
greatest O
among O
you O
. O

People O
who O
think O
they O
are O
better O
than O
others O
will O
be O
made O
humble O
. O

But O
people O
who O
humble O
themselves O
will O
be O
made O
great O
. O

`` O
It O
will O
be O
bad O
for O
you O
teachers O
of O
the O
law O
and O
you O
Pharisees O
! O

You O
are O

! O

You O
close O

for O

to O
enter O
God O
's O

. O

You O
yourselves O
do O
n't O

, O
and O
you O
stop O
those O
who O
are O

to O
enter O
. O

`` O
It O
will O
be O
bad O
for O
you O
teachers O
of O
the O
law O
and O
you O
Pharisees O
! O

You O
are O

. O

You O

and O

to O

. O

. O

And O
you O

so O

that O

! O

`` O
It O
will O

the O
law O
and O

! O

You O

, O

. O

Ca O

. O

It O

! O

Whoever O

`` O

. O

Later O

. O

, O

. O

. O
'' O

The O

were O

would O
be O

. O

Jesus O
and O
his O

went O
to O

. O

There O
the O
men O
who O
collect O
the O
two O
- O
drachma O
Temple O
tax O
came O
to O

and O
asked O
, O
`` O
Does O
your O

pay O
the O
Temple O
tax O
? O
'' O

Peter O
answered O
, O
`` O
Yes O
, O
he O
does O
. O
'' O

Peter O
went O
into O
the O
house O
where O
Jesus O
was O
. O

Before O
Peter O
could O
speak O
, O
Jesus O
said O
to O
him O
, O
`` O
The O
kings O
on O
the O
earth O
get O
different O
kinds O
of O
taxes O
from O
people O
. O

But O
who O
are O

who O

? O

Are O

the O
king O
's O
children O
? O

Or O
do O
other O
people O
pay O
the O
taxes O
? O

What O
do O
you O
think O
? O
'' O

Peter O
answered O
, O
`` O
The O
other O
people O
pay O
the O
taxes O
. O
'' O

Jesus O
said O
, O
`` O
Then O
the O
children O
of O
the O
king O
do O
n't O
have O
to O
pay O
taxes O
. O

But O
we O
do O
n't O
want O
to O
upset O
these O
tax O
collectors O
. O

So O
do O
this O
: O
Go O
to O
the O
lake O
and O
fish O
. O

After O
you O
catch O
the O
first O
fish O
, O
open O
its O
mouth O
. O

Inside O
its O
mouth O
you O
will O
find O
a O
four O
- O
drachma O
coin O
. O

Take O
that O
coin O
and O
give O
it O
to O

. O

of O

. O
'' O

About O
that O
time O
the O
followers O
came O
to O
Jesus O
and O
asked O
, O
`` O
Who O
is O
the O
greatest O
in O
God O
's O
kingdom O
? O
'' O

Jesus O
called O
a O
little O
child O
to O

to O

. O

He O
stood O

child O
in O

. O

, O
`` O

is O
, O

must O

and O

like O

. O

If O
you O

, O

never O

's O

. O

The O

in O

's O

is O

who O
makes O

like O

. O

`` O
Whoever O
accepts O
a O
little O
child O
like O
this O
in O
my O
name O
is O
accepting O
me O
. O

`` O

, O

someone O

, O

for O

. O

It O
would O

to O
have O
a O

around O

and O

in O

. O

I O

in O

because O

that O
make O

. O

These O

, O

who O

to O

. O

`` O
If O
your O
hand O
or O

makes O

, O
cut O

off O
and O
throw O

. O

to O

and O

than O

two O

into O

that O
burns O
forever O
. O

If O
your O

makes O
you O

, O

out O
and O
throw O

away O
. O

It O
is O
better O
for O
you O
to O

only O

and O

life O
than O
to O
have O
two O

and O

into O

. O

. O

. O

. O

`` O

him O
with O
my O

, O
and O

. O

look O

foolish O
that O
they O
stopped O
trying O
to O
argue O
with O
him O
. O

So O
the O
Pharisees O
had O
a O

. O

Then O
one O
of O
them O
, O
an O
expert O
in O
the O
Law O
of O

, O

Jesus O
a O

to O

. O

He O
said O
, O
`` O
Teacher O
, O
which O
command O
in O
the O
law O
is O
the O
most O
important O
? O
'' O

Jesus O
answered O
, O
`` O
' O
Love O
the O
Lord O
your O
God O
with O
all O

heart O
, O
all O

, O
and O

. O
' O

This O
is O
the O
first O
and O
most O

command O
. O

And O

is O

the O

: O
' O

the O

as O

. O

All O

and O

of O

take O

from O

. O
'' O

So O

, O

. O

, O
`` O

? O

? O
'' O

, O
`` O

. O
'' O

, O
`` O

' O

' O
? O

was O

by O

. O

, O
' O

' O

? O
'' O

. O

day O
, O
no O

more O

. O

When O

was O
the O
right O
time O
, O

the O
Baptizer O
began O
telling O
people O
a O
message O
from O

. O

This O
was O
out O
in O
the O

area O
of O

. O

John O

, O
`` O
Change O
your O
hearts O
and O

, O

's O

is O

. O
'' O

John O
is O
the O
one O

the O

was O
talking O
about O
when O

, O
`` O
There O

. O

John O
's O

were O
made O
from O
camel O
's O

, O
and O
he O

a O

around O

. O

. O

from O

in O

. O

. O

, O

, O

! O

. O

from O
these O

. O

The O
ax O
is O
now O

to O

the O

. O

Every O

and O

. O

. O

who O

. O

and O

. O

. O

, O

. O

, O

`` O

's O

will O
be O
like O

who O

. O

. O

, O

, O

! O

. O

! O

. O

, O

, O

! O

do O

. O

`` O

always O

ready O
. O

You O
do O

when O

. O

`` O

's O

will O
also O
be O
like O

leaving O

to O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

Those O

. O

. O

. O

. O

's O

. O

. O

. O

. O

, O

, O

. O

So O

. O

, O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

. O

The O

, O
' O

, O

. O

You O

. O

. O

So O

. O

. O

`` O

, O

! O

. O

. O

. O

`` O

, O
' O

of O

. O

. O

They O

. O

But O

who O

not O

what O

away O
from O

. O
' O

Then O
the O
master O
said O
, O
' O

that O
useless O
servant O
outside O
into O
the O
darkness O
, O
where O
people O
will O
cry O
and O

with O

. O
' O

`` O
The O
Son O
of O
Man O
will O
come O
again O
with O
divine O

, O
and O
all O
his O
angels O
will O
come O
with O
him O
. O

He O
will O
sit O
as O
king O
on O
his O
great O
and O

. O

All O
the O
people O
of O
the O

will O
be O

before O

. O

Then O
he O
will O
separate O
everyone O
into O
two O

. O

It O
will O
be O
like O
a O

separating O
his O

from O
his O

. O

He O
will O
put O
the O
sheep O
on O
his O
right O
and O
the O
goats O
on O
his O
left O
. O

`` O
Then O
the O
king O
will O
say O
to O
the O
godly O
people O
on O
his O
right O
, O
' O
Come O
, O
my O
Father O
has O
great O
blessings O
for O
you O
. O

The O
kingdom O
he O
promised O
is O
now O
yours O
. O

It O
has O
been O
prepared O
for O
you O
since O
the O
world O
was O
made O
. O

It O
is O
yours O
because O
when O
I O
was O
hungry O
, O
you O
gave O
me O
food O
to O
eat O
. O

When O
I O
was O
thirsty O
, O
you O
gave O
me O
something O
to O
drink O
. O

When O
I O
had O
no O
place O
to O
stay O
, O
you O
welcomed O
me O
into O
your O
home O
. O

When O
I O
was O
without O
clothes O
, O
you O
gave O
me O
something O
to O
wear O
. O

When O
I O
was O
sick O
, O
you O
cared O
for O
me O
. O

When O
I O
was O
in O
prison O
, O
you O
came O
to O
visit O
me O
. O
' O

`` O
Then O
the O
godly O
people O
will O
answer O
, O
' O
Lord O
, O
when O
did O
we O
see O
you O
hungry O
and O
give O
you O
food O
? O

When O
did O
we O
see O
you O
thirsty O
and O
give O
you O
something O
to O
drink O
? O

When O
did O
we O
see O
you O
with O
no O
place O
to O
stay O
and O
welcome O
you O
into O
our O

wrong O
would O
be O
perfect O
. O

Someone O
like O
that O
would O
be O
able O
to O
control O
their O
whole O
body O
too O
. O

We O
put O
bits O
into O
the O
mouths O
of O
horses O
to O
make O
them O
obey O
us O
. O

With O
these O
bits O
we O
can O
control O
their O
whole O
body O
. O

It O
is O
the O
same O
with O
ships O
. O

A O
ship O
is O
very O
big O
, O
and O
it O
is O
pushed O
by O
strong O
winds O
. O

But O
a O

controls O
that O

. O

And O

one O
who O

decides O
where O

. O

It O
goes O
where O
he O
wants O

to O
go O
. O

It O
is O

same O
with O
our O
tongue O
. O

It O
is O
a O
small O
part O
of O
the O
body O
, O
but O
it O
can O
boast O
about O
doing O
great O
things O
. O

A O
big O

fire O
can O

with O
only O

. O

The O
tongue O
is O
like O
a O

. O

It O
is O
a O
world O
of O
evil O
among O
the O
parts O
of O
our O

. O

It O

evil O

whole O
body O
and O
starts O
a O
fire O
that O
influences O
all O
of O
life O
. O

It O
gets O
this O
fire O
from O
hell O
. O

Humans O
have O
control O
over O
every O
kind O
of O
wild O
animal O
, O
bird O
, O

, O
and O

, O

have O

all O

. O

But O
no O

can O

the O
tongue O
. O

It O
is O
wild O
and O
evil O
, O
full O
of O

. O

We O
use O

to O

and O

, O
but O

we O
curse O
people O
who O
were O

's O

. O

These O

and O

come O

the O

. O

My O
brothers O
and O
sisters O
, O
this O
should O
not O
happen O
. O

Do O
good O
water O

water O

? O

Of O
course O
not O
. O

My O

and O
sisters O
, O
can O
a O
fig O
tree O
make O
olives O
? O

Or O

? O

No O
, O
and O
a O
well O
full O
of O
salty O
water O
can O
not O
give O
good O
water O
. O

Are O
there O
any O
among O
you O
who O
are O
really O
wise O
and O

? O

Then O
you O
should O
show O

by O

. O

You O
should O
do O
what O
is O
good O
with O

. O

A O

person O
does O
not O
boast O
. O

If O

and O

. O

'' O

. O

. O

. O

right O

Greetings O
from O

, O

. O

. O

Whoever O

is O
like O
a O
wave O
in O

that O

. O

People O
like O

! O

, O

You O

. O

. O

. O

My O
dear O

and O
sisters O
, O
do O
n't O
be O

about O
this O
. O

Everything O
good O

. O

. O

. O

Christ O
is O
the O
one O
who O
is O
exactly O
like O

. O

We O
do O

about O
ourselves O
. O

that O

is O

, O

that O

are O
your O

for O

. O

God O

, O
`` O
Let O

shine O
out O
of O
the O

! O
'' O

And O

from O

, O

, O

, O

. O

. O

The O

in O

, O

. O

, O

. O

The O

This O

from O

. O
