, O
why O
are O
you O
telling O
me O
this O
? O

It O
is O
not O
yet O
time O
for O
me O
to O
begin O
my O
work O
. O
'' O

His O
mother O
said O
to O
the O
servants O
, O
`` O
Do O
what O
he O
tells O
you O
. O
'' O

There O
were O
six O
large O
stone O
waterpots O
there O
that O
were O
used O
by O
the O
Jews O
in O
their O
washing O
ceremonies O
. O

Each O
one O
held O
about O
20 O
or O
30 O
gallons O
. O

Jesus O
said O
to O
the O
servants O
, O
`` O
Fill O
the O
waterpots O
with O
water O
. O
'' O

So O
they O
filled O
them O
to O
the O
top O
. O

Then O
he O
said O
to O

, O
`` O
Now O
dip O
out O
some O
water O
and O
take O
it O
to O
the O
man O
in O
charge O
of O
the O
feast O
. O
'' O

So O
they O
did O
what O
he O
said O
. O

Then O
the O
man O
in O
charge O
tasted O
it O
, O
but O
the O
water O
had O
become O
wine O
. O

He O
did O
not O
know O
where O
the O
wine O
had O
come O
from O
, O
but O
the O
servants O
who O
brought O
the O
water O
knew O
. O

He O
called O
the O

and O
said O
to O

, O
`` O
People O
always O
serve O
the O
best O
wine O
first O
. O

Later O
, O

are O

, O

the O
cheaper O
wine O
. O

But O
you O
have O
saved O

best O
wine O
until O
now O
. O
'' O

This O
was O
the O
first O
of O
all O

Jesus O

. O

He O
did O
it O
in O

of O

. O

By O
this O

his O

, O

believed O
in O

. O

Then O
Jesus O
went O
to O
the O

of O
Capernaum O
. O

His O

and O

and O

. O

there O
a O

. O

It O
was O

for O
the O
Jewish O
Passover O
, O

went O
to O
Jerusalem O
. O

There O
in O

Temple O
area O
he O

cattle O
, O

, O
and O
doves O
. O

He O

sitting O

, O

and O

's O

. O

made O
a O

some O

of O

. O

Then O

forced O
all O

men O

to O

the O

area O
. O

He O
turned O
over O
the O

of O

and O
scattered O
their O

. O

Then O

said O
to O
those O
who O
were O
selling O

, O
`` O
Take O
these O
things O
out O
of O
here O
! O

Do O

make O

's O
house O
a O

! O
'' O

When O

remembered O

in O

: O
`` O
My O

to O

will O

. O
'' O

, O

. O
'' O

, O

People O
worked O
46 O

to O

! O

Do O

? O

was O

. O

, O

that O
he O
had O
said O
this O
. O

So O

the O

, O

the O

Jesus O

. O

Jesus O
was O
in O

for O

. O

Many O

in O

because O

. O

But O

, O

. O

what O
a O

was O

. O

already O
knew O
. O

There O
was O
a O

, O

. O

was O
an O

. O

, O

, O

. O

, O

. O

Anyone O
who O
is O

's O

. O
'' O

, O
`` O
How O
can O
a O

? O

and O

? O

, O
`` O
Believe O
me O
when O
I O
say O
that O

be O

from O
water O
and O

Spirit O
. O

Anyone O
who O
is O
not O
born O
from O
water O

not O
enter O
God O
's O

. O

The O
only O

people O
get O
from O

. O

But O

. O

Do O

that O
I O

, O
' O
You O

be O
born O
again O
. O
' O

The O

blows O
wherever O

. O

You O

, O

do O

. O

. O

, O

? O

Jesus O

, O
`` O
You O
are O
an O

of O

still O
do O

understand O
these O

? O

The O

is O
, O
we O
talk O
about O
what O
we O
know O
. O

We O
tell O
about O
what O
we O
have O
seen O
. O

But O
you O

do O

accept O
what O
we O

. O

I O
have O
told O

about O
things O
here O
on O

, O

do O
not O

. O

So O
I O
'm O
sure O
you O
will O
not O
believe O
me O
if O
I O
tell O
you O
about O

things O
! O

The O
only O

who O
has O
ever O
gone O
up O
to O

is O
the O

who O
came O
down O

-- O

of O

. O

`` O

up O

in O

. O

is O
the O

with O

. O

. O

Then O
everyone O
who O

in O
him O
can O
have O

. O
'' O

Yes O
, O
God O
loved O
the O
world O
so O
much O
that O
he O
gave O
his O
only O
Son O
, O
so O
that O

who O

would O
not O

but O
have O
eternal O

. O

God O
sent O
his O
Son O
into O
the O
world O
. O

He O
did O
not O

to O
judge O
the O

, O
but O
to O
save O
the O
world O
through O

. O

People O
who O
believe O
in O
God O
's O
Son O
are O
not O

. O

But O
people O
who O
do O
not O
believe O
are O
already O

, O
because O
they O
have O
not O

in O

's O
only O

. O

They O
are O
judged O
by O
this O

: O
The O
light O
has O
come O
into O
the O

. O

But O

did O
not O

. O

They O
wanted O

, O
because O

were O
doing O
evil O

. O

Everyone O
who O
does O
evil O
hates O

. O

They O
will O
not O

, O

will O

. O

But O

. O

through O

. O

. O

was O

. O

. O

, O
`` O
A O

. O

The O

just O

. O

. O

That O
's O

. O

I O

. O

He O
must O

more O

, O

less O

. O

`` O
The O

who O
comes O
from O
above O
is O
greater O
than O
all O
others O
. O

The O
one O
who O
is O
from O
the O
earth O
belongs O
to O
the O
earth O
. O

He O
talks O
about O
things O
that O
are O
on O
the O
earth O
. O

But O
the O
one O
who O
comes O
from O

is O

. O

He O

, O

do O

what O

. O

what O

has O

that O
God O

the O

. O

God O
sent O
him O
, O
and O
he O
tells O
people O
what O
God O
says O
. O

God O
gives O
him O
the O
Spirit O
fully O
. O

The O
Father O
loves O
the O
Son O
and O
has O
given O
him O
power O
over O
everything O
. O

Whoever O
believes O
in O
the O
Son O
has O

. O

But O
those O
who O
do O
not O
obey O

Son O
will O
never O
have O
that O
life O
. O

They O
can O
not O
get O

from O
God O
's O
anger O
. O
'' O

Six O

before O

Passover O
festival O
, O

went O

. O

That O
is O
where O

, O

. O

There O

. O

' O

. O

. O

. O

, O

, O

. O

And O

. O

, O
`` O

. O

for O

-- O

. O

. O

. O
'' O

, O

. O

, O

. O

. O

of O

and O

. O

That O
is O
why O

too O
. O

The O

the O

in O

. O

These O
were O
the O

. O

They O

, O

! O

Jesus O

, O

, O
`` O

, O

! O

! O

. O

But O

. O

is O

. O
'' O

. O

- O

, O

`` O

! O

. O

. O

! O

that O

that O

: O

. O

stars O
are O

of O

. O

angel O
showed O

the O

the O

of O

, O
clear O
as O

. O

flows O
from O

of O

and O

. O

down O
the O

. O

The O

of O

is O

the O

, O
and O
it O
produces O

every O

, O

times O
a O

. O

The O
leaves O
of O
the O
tree O
are O
for O

the O
nations O
. O

Nothing O
that O
God O
judges O
guilty O
will O
be O
there O
in O
that O
city O
. O

The O
throne O
of O
God O
and O
the O
Lamb O
will O
be O
in O
the O
city O
. O

God O
's O
servants O
will O

. O

They O
will O
see O

. O

's O
name O
will O

. O

There O
will O
never O

again O
. O

People O
will O
not O

have O
power O
to O

the O
water O

. O

They O

. O

They O

. O

two O

have O
finished O

, O

will O
fight O
against O

. O

This O
is O

that O
comes O
up O
from O

. O

It O
will O

and O

. O

of O

. O

. O

of O

, O

. O

, O

. O

, O

. O

Grace O
, O

, O
and O

from O

and O
Christ O
Jesus O

. O

When O
I O
went O
to O

, O

to O

in O

. O

Some O

that O

to O

to O

. O

. O

And O
that O

, O

, O

, O

. O

They O
are O
always O

, O
because O
they O
are O
people O
whose O

has O
been O
confused O
. O

They O
have O

their O
understanding O
of O
the O
truth O
. O

They O
think O
that O
devotion O
to O
God O
is O
a O
way O
to O
get O
rich O
. O

Devotion O
to O
God O
is O
, O
in O
fact O
, O
a O
way O
for O
people O
to O
be O
very O
rich O
, O
but O
only O
if O
it O
makes O
them O
satisfied O
with O
what O
they O
have O
. O

When O
we O
came O
into O
the O
world O
, O
we O
brought O
nothing O
. O

And O
when O
we O
die O
, O
we O
can O

nothing O
out O
. O

So O
, O
if O

, O
we O
will O
be O
satisfied O
with O
that O
. O

People O
who O
want O

be O

bring O

to O
themselves O
. O

They O
